11.title: Sailor Moon

112.content:
You were running through the forest with the remains of Princess Serenity's Life force in a bottle. You were about to reach the designated place when an old friend appeared.
"Calindor," you said "What are you doing here?"
"I am here to take that life force energy and give it to my mistress Queen Berel." said Calindor
"I thought you were on our side?"
"I have had enough of your honour and so now I'm evil."
"Well you can't have this life force."
You put down the bottle and Calindor attacked you and began to pummel you when your body was surrounded by light and you transformed.
"Power of the sun." you said "I am Solaris Knight."
You pulled out a lamp and switched it to a blaster form.
"Laser lamp," you said "Full power."
You and Calindor attacked each other and put a curse on one another, sealing you both away for a long time.
112.title: The Traitor

1121.content:
Suddenly, there was an explosion. There were some miners and they found your body. You could sense them but you couldn't open your eyes or move at all. You were thought to be some kind of ancient historical warrior so you were put in a museum.

It had been a month since you were put in the museum but you were surviving it due to your immortality. Then you felt a massive power source.
"It can't be." you thought to yourself then you saw her. The reincarnation of princess serenity.
"Say, Serena." said one of the girls near her
"Yeah Amy?" said Serena
"That warrior is not from any civilisation I've read about. And he's giving off a massive amount of power."
"We'll just have to stay here past closing time to see if he is not a museum piece."

After closing time, Amy and Serena had torches and were inspecting you when another museum piece came to life. This monster was too strong for them. They transformed but were still too weak. Moon crashed into your glass wall and broke through, her hand rubbed against your chest. Power surged through your whole body and you blasted a laser at the monster. You grabbed Moon's hand and kissed it then said
"Thank you my lady, you have broken the curse." The monster turned to you. You pulled out a ticket and a train conducter's ticket stamper and transformed into "Solaris Knight."
You pulled out the laser lamp and charged it up. Then you fired it at the monster.
"Okay," you said "Ready Jinjee?" A cat's head poked itself out of the lamp top and said
"You bet."
"Laser lamp" you said "Fire."
Jinjee's full body attacked the monster yelling
"Jinjee shining attack."
The monster was destroyed.
1121.title: Freedom (contains spoilers)

11421.content:
During a fight against whatever Youma Jadeite sent out this week Sailor Moon was getting her butt kicked but this time there was no Tuxedo Mask to save her.
"Now, kill her!" Jadeite yelled out
The Youma attacked with its extremely sharp nails but it was stopped by you grabbing it.
"I'm not going to let you go on with this unmatched fight." you said angrily and the symbol of the King of Hearts appeared on the back of your right hand
The Youma got out of your grasp and lunged at you.
"RISE, GUNDAM!" you yelled and snapped your fingers
Out of the wall came the God Gundam but it was human sized. It then broke apart and attached to you as powered armour.
"What the hell?" the Youma asked
"Let's go!" you drew your sword and charged at the Youma "God Slash!"
You slashed the Youma, cutting it's right arm off, causing it to stumble back in surprise. It then regrew it's arm and attacked you again but it's nails didn't even scratch your armour. You fired your vulcans, damaging the Youma.
"Let's end this." you said
The chest section opened, the six wings stretched out and the armour on your right arm covered your hand. You raised your right arm.
"Ikkuzo! Ore no kono tega maka ni moeru! Shorio scameto todoroki sakebu! Bakunetsu! God! FINGER!" You jammed your right hand into the Youma's chest and raised it above you. "HEAT! END!"
The Youma exploded but Jadeite escaped.
"He got away." you sighed
You left as well causing Usagi to look in confusion
"What the hell just happened?"

121.content: One day, the sailor scouts were facing a machanical force called the Dark Army. The scouts fought with all their might, but the Dark Army kept on coming. Eventually the scouts were backed into a group and surrounded. Then they saw something slicing through the Dark Army. Then they saw you with two energy swords in your hands while flying through the army.Then the Dark Army made a hasty retreat and you were alone with the sailor scouts. "Who are you?" asked Sailor Mercury. "My name is (Name). But in this form I am known as Shining Gundam. The force you just fought is a group called the Dark Army, a force created by my brother Kyoji. I am serching for him so I can take him down." you said. Jupiter asked why and you said to her "Because my parents are gone because of him. He used his powers to kill them and become the Dark Gundam." Jupiter and the others were absolutely shocked with that fact. You transformed back to normal and they all stared at you with lust. They transformed back and asked where you lived. You then said you had no home. Amy then offered for you to stay at her home. You asked if her parents would mind and she said that her parents were out of town for a while. You accepted your offer and the two of you went to her home.
121.title: Dark Army

1211.content: When the two of you arrived at Amy's home, you looked around and saw that Amy was a science lover. You then said to her "That's one thing we have in common." Amy looked confused and you told her that science was your specialty as well. She then showed you to the guest room and you went inside. Amy then noticed a strange crest on your right hand. You then said to her "This is the King of Hearts crest. I am the leader of the Shuffle Alliance. A group from anient times who's task is to maintain order in the world of fighting. The form you saw me in earlier was called Shining Gundam. He is the way I will help mankind prevent war. I plan to create the most advanced form of combat. It will be like a tournament which progresses over 11 months then the finals will be held in one location. This will save man-kind altogether." Amy just stared at you with love. She then went to bed and you did the same.
1211.title: Amy's Home

12111.content:
(Master Asia/Gundam You)

The next day, you got dressed and went outside to get some air. But then the Dark Army showed up again and you transformed into Shining Gundam and Mercury arrived shortly after. You and Mercury destroyed many soldiers but they just kept coming. But then they backed off and made a path leading to another gundam. "Who are you?" The gundam looked at you and said "It's been a long time (name)." You gasped and said in a surprised tone "Master Asia?" "Yes my deciple." "You're a fallower of the dark gundam?" you asked as you fell to your knees. "I know it is a shock, but believe in me and you will trully be saved (name)." A weird energy came from his hand and he was hypnotising you. Mercury tried to snap you out of it, but Master Gundam attacked her. This snapped you out of it and you raised your right hand. "Just what are you doing? You dare-""Enough. This hand of mine glows with an awesome power. Its burning grip tells me to defeat you, a man who is no longer my master! Here I go. SHINING FINGER!" you said as you charged at him. "In that case, DARKNESS FINGER!" Then you and Master Gundam locked hands. "You're weak (name). Your Shining Finger has absolutely no effect on me anymore (name)." You then began to scream in pain. "So how's that? So do not feel like doing whatever I say?" he said as he bagan to crush your arm. "This can't be. My master'd never.. he'd never do this kind of thing!" "Well then, I'll have to convince you by crushing your right arm!" As he began to literaly crush your arm, Mercury attacked him, forcing him to let go. "I will be back" he said as he fled. The Dark Army fallowed him. But shortly after he left, the pain was too much and you passed out, forcing you to transform back. But as you fell to the ground, Mercury caught you and the scouts showed upi. They helped Amy get you inside.

121111.content: When you woke up, you saw that you were back in the guest room. The girls noticed you were awake and Amy embraced you. She must have been incredibly worried. You knew this and you embraced her as well. Soon she let you go and you went outside to get some air. But this time, Amy went with you. She saw that you used your powers to make a guitar that could make you a "one-man band". You started to play the guitar and layed "You're Not Me" from the offician Yu-Gi-Oh movie soundtrack. She loved the song and you placed the guitar on the ground. Soon she saw the sadness in your eyes and she placed her hand on your back. She told you that it would be OK. "I still can't beleive it. Master has become an enemy." you said. Amy said she understood and you felt a little it better. You went back inside and began to meditate. You remembered the days you trained with Master Asia. It was a painful memory, but you still managed to get the pain out of your system.

122.content: One day, the scouts were fighting a huge battle against the negaverse. As Mercury was about to die, they heard someone yell "Solar Lazer!" A beam of light forced the creatures to back away from Sailor Mercury. The scouts looked and saw you as Solaris Knight. "Leave them alone." you said. You then went to check on Sailor Mercury. "Are you alright?" you asked as you offered your hand to Sailor Mercury. She blushed and grabbed your hand. You helped her to her feet and she asked who you were. You then transformed back to normal and the scouts just stared at you with lust. "My name is (name) Uchiha. Nice to meet you." Somewhere along the line, Amy asked you what your dreams are. You gave a serious look and said "What I desire isn't a dream, because I will make it a reality. I'm going to restore my clan, and destroy a certain someone." The scouts were curious at what you meant by "restore your clan." You then went to a computer and typed in "Uchiha Clan". The computer came with a result and you said "Look at the computer for your answer." Then you went outside to clear your head. As you were out of the room, the scouts read the information provided. It told them that your clan was wiped out by your own brother. They realized that you were the last of your clan. Amy then went outside to talk to you.

131111221112111111111111111111111.content: As you can too you heard Lita say "Hey Rei, he's waking up." You then saw all the scouts sitting around you. Rei then embraced you with all her might. You groan in pain. "oh right. Sorry." said Rei. "it's ok. What happened?" you said. The Mina said "you tell us. One second we heard a fight going on and the next thing we know, we see you on the ground." "Oh right. The last emerald is guarded by the seven most powerful primevals minus heart. We are in for quite a fight." you said. Just then a Large explosion struck the city. You knew it was them. You tried to get up, but Rei pushed you back in the bed. "You aren't oging anywhere like that." Then she and the others transformed and told you to stay put. They saw that you passed out from exaustion and left. What they didn't know was you were just faking it and you transformed and fallowed them.
131111221112111111111111111111111.title: Wake up in Rei's house

1311112211121111111111111111111111.content:
The scouts were trying to hit the seven primevals with ranged attacks but ribs was turning their attacks into particles. The scouts went for meele attacks but eyes helped the primevals dodge by knowing the future. After a while the primevals got bored so they transformed into their robot forms and were about to kill the scouts when they heared
"10 LINKED MASER CANNONS! FIRE!" and ten lasers were fired at the primevals, kicking them down. The scouts turned and saw King J-Der standing there, pointing his fingers at the primevals. Then out of King J-Der came a robotic lion, the bullet train, a stealth jet plane, a drill machine,a motorcycle, a one man helicoptor, a police car, a red fire truck, a blue truck, an orange tank and a box-shaped robot in a hovercraft.
"Everyone," you yelled "Perform fusion now."
Mars fused with the lion to become
"GaiGar."
Venus fused with the blue truck and Jupiter fused with the red truck to become
"Hyoryu."
"Enryu."
Mercury fused with the police care to become
"Volfogg."
And finally, Moon fused with the box bot to become
"Mic Sounders the 13th."
The truck transformed into a larger
"Goldymarg."
GaiGar combined with the bullet train, drill machine and the stealth jet to become
"GaoGaiGar." which replaced it's right arm with goldy to gain the goldion hammer.
Then Hyoryu and Enryu performed a symmetrical docking to become
"Choryujin."
Volfogg combined with the left over machines to become
"Big Volfogg."
The primevals left, knowing there was no way they could win at this rate.
1311112211121111111111111111111111.title: The Battle

13111122111211111111111111111111111.content: You all transformed back and you picked up the last Chaos emerald. It was absorbed into your body and the energy multilied 100 times. However it was getting late. But as you were all heading home. The negaverse showed itself again and found that you had all the chaos emeralds. But insted of fighting you, Malichite, Jedite, and Zoysite, kneeled in front of the portal and Queen Berel came through the portal. Soon she trapped the souts in a sphere and said "Now it's just you and me." She then transformed and she was much more powerful than before. "Behold, the ultimate Dark Evolution." You transformed and went into your super form ad the battle began.
13111122111211111111111111111111111.title: Later

131111221112111111111111111111111111.content:
You and Berel battled each other but she was far superior to you, even with the chaos emeralds help.
"Why do you attack Earth?" you asked
"So they will die for other species to evolve. You are full of negative emotions and must be destoryed."
Music began to play and you sang while fighting Berel.
"I'm diggin' with my fingertips
I'm gripping at the ground I stand upon
I'm searching for fragile bones
Evolution
I'm never gonna be refined
Keep trying but I won't assimilate
Should we have come far in time
Watch the bow break

And I'm sorry that I don't believe
By the evidence that I see
That there's any hope left for me
It's evolution
Just evolution

And I I do not dare deny
The basic beast inside
It's right here it's controlling my mind
And why do I deserve to die
I'm dominated by
This animal that's locked up inside

Close up to get a real good view
I'm betting that the species will survive
Hold tight I'm getting inside you
Evolution
And when we're gonna find these bones
They're gonna want to keep them in a jar
The number one virus caused by
Procreation

And the planet may go astray
In a million years I'll say
Those motherfuckers were all deranged
It's evolution
Just evolution

And I I do not dare deny
The basic beast inside
It's right here it's controlling my mind
And why do I deserve to die
I'm dominated by
This animal that's locked up inside

Take a look around (take a look around)
Nothing much has changed
Take a look around (take a look around)
Nothing much has changed
Take a look around
Take a look around
Take a look around

I I do not dare deny

And why do I deserve to die

Why?
Why do I deserve to die?"
Berel was badly hurt but then all 31 primeval cores went into her and then everyone was transported to near Jupiter. You were all in your robots in their most powerful forms.
131111221112111111111111111111111111.title: Soldato J vs Queen Berel

1312.content:
(You Rei Amy Wallow Rini/Mini Moon Lita Mina)

The Sailor Scouts were once again in a battle with some kind of water demon. But this one was incredibly powerful. “What is this thing doing here?” “I don’t know, but I am getting tired of this. Mars Celestial Fire Surround!” she said as she attacked. The demon felt a great deal of pain, but didn’t go down. "No way, Mars, your attack hurt him, but there's not a scratch." "It looks like he is made of nothing out of water." "Alright then, let me try. Supreme Tunder Crash!" Jupiter's lightning did cause a massive amount of pain for the demon, but still he survived. "I have had enough of you fools. The fire one goes first!" He said as he drew his hand back and landed a powerful backhand to Sailor Mars. She was sent into the air and the others continued to fight the demon. But before she could hit the ground, something caught her in midair. She opened her eyes to see a man in a sleeveless black overcoat which reached halfway down his calves. It also had three spikes on each shoulder. He also wore black jeans and leather boots, which were also black. He also sported black gloves with quite a few spikes. “Are you alright?” She blushed a bit and tried to answer, but she felt an intense pain in her side. “Looks like you’re injured.” you said as you very gently placed her up against a tree. “Let me take care of this guy.” “But-” “Relax, I can handle myself quite well.” you said as you began to walk towards the demon. The demon noticed you walking towards him and began to take a few steps back. “S-Sasuke!” “Now I think it’s time to send you to oblivion where you belong.” Wallow started to back away and before he could blink, you appeared in front of him and landed a powerful kick to his face, sending him flying backwards until he hit a very large tree. The girls were amazed by this, because they could hardly scratch this thing. Even Jupiter had trouble with this one. “Now, it ends.” you said focusing the power of lightning into your right hand. The girls were surprised by this even more. You then charged toward Wallow and jumped into the air. You then thrusted your hand forward yelling “Chidori!” The attack pierced his heart and all of the electricity surged through him. He was about to explode into a massive wave of electrified water, until you jumped back and used the power of wind to contain it. When he exploded, the barrier of air expanded quite a bit, but it didn’t break. You then walked over to it and absorbed both the water and the lightning, increasing your power over both. Once that was down, you needed to check on Mars.
1312.title: Chaos and Mars

13121.content:
(Serena) (Your new look is exaclty the same as Sasuke in Naruto Shippuden)

As you walked over to Mars in he same cool and collected way you did with Wallow, Lita and Mina had hearts in their eyes. Even Amy was a bit taken with you. “Let me take a look.” You then focused energy into your eyes and saw that she had a broken rib. “Alright, it’s an easy fix.” “What do you mean?” “Just trust me, and watch.” you said focusing energy into your hand. You then placed it over the are of the broken rib, which was right below the breast. Your energy flowed into her body and healed her broken rib instantly. She stood up feeling better than ever. “Wow, thanks! Who are you anyway, and what was that thing?” “I will answer the second question if you have somewhere private we can talk. As for who I am, my name is Sasuke Uchiha. It’s a pleasure to meet you all at last.” “You’ve heard of us?” Lita asked in her infatuated state. “Yes, I will explain everything in a moment, but I better change out of my battle armor.” you said as your outfit began to change. Once it finished changing, the girls looked pretty surprised. “How did you-” “My outfit is composed out of my own energy. I can easily change its appearance." “I think you should keep that one.” “I agree Rei, there was a little too much going on with that last outfit.” “Very well. I like this outfit anyway." you said as you began to walk towards Rei’s temple. “I say we chat there.” you said pointing to the temple. Rei and the others agreed and you all walked to the temple.
13121.title: A New Ally

131211.content: Soon, you and the others arrived at the temple, the girls introduced themselves one by one. “My name’s Serena.” “My name is Rini.” “I’m Amy, a pleasure to make your acutance.” “I’m Lita.” she said with the usual love struck look on her face. “My name is Mina.” “My name is Rei. I would like to thank you for healing my broken rib.” “No problem.” “Now, do you mind explaining what that thing was.” “That was Wallow, he is a demon who works for Blackheart, a demon who was involved in the destruction of my clan.” “He killed every member of your clan?” “No, he helped, but the ones who killed my clan were known as the Ten Terrors. They are the followers of the ultimate evil known as the Master.” “How strong is this guy?” “He and the terrors were so powerful, the three strongest members of my clan; my mother father and brother gave their lives to seal them away. But the time where they will rise again is coming.” “Sasuke…” Serena decided to change the subject for a moment, which you didn’t mind. “Do you live near-by?” “I have no home.” “What?” “My home and my clan was completely destroyed by Blackheart. If I didn’t have the power of Chaos Control, I never would have survived.” “I’m so sorry Sasuke.” “Thanks Rei, but there was nothing I could do. I had no control over my powers back then. Maybe if I did, I could have saved my clan from destruction.” “Don’t blame yourself Sasuke.” “Thanks, but it isn’t easy to do that.” “Well, you are more than welcome to stay here at the temple Sasuke.” “I don’t want to impose.” “Hey, it’s the least I can do.” “Thank you Rei. I am happy to have met people like you.” “We’re pretty glad to have met you as well.” Soon, all of the others left and you and Rei were alone. She showed you to your room and you went to sleep shortly after that.
131211.title: Your Story

1312111.content:
(Grandpa/Mr. Hino)

The next day, Rei woke up early for chores as usual and put on her kimono. She went outside and saw that you were standing on top of the gate of her shrine. She watched you as you practiced your martial arts skills with perfect balance. She was greatly impressed by your style of fighting. Soon, you completed your training and jumped down from the gates, landing on your feet with ease. You noticed Rei in her kimono and walked over to her. “Morning Rei.” “Good morning Sasuke.” she said with a slight blush on her face. “That Kimono looks good on you.” Now she was blushing brighter than before. “Th-thank you.” The two of you looked into each other’s eyes for a moment before you were both interrupted by what sounded like an elderly man. “Rei, where are you? Have you finished sweeping yet?” he said coming around the corner of the temple. He then noticed you and walked over to Rei. “So Rei, is this your boyfriend?” Rei blushed and said “No Grandpa! He’s just a friend.” “Then why is his stuff here?” “Well…” “My apologies sir. My name is Sasuke Uchiha. You see I have no where to go, and Rei was kind enough to let me stay here.” The old man inspected you for a bit. “Well, you are welcome to stay as long as you want Sasuke.” “Thank you Mr. Hino.” you said bowing. “Oh don’t be so formal. Just call me Grandpa. From the energy I sense between you two, I bet you and Rei will make me a great grandpa before I know it.” “Grandpa!” she said with a deep blush. You were blushing pretty bright yourself. “I will help out with the chores.” “Great, I’m sure Rei would appreciate your help. And also, I am sorry to hear about what happened to your clan. I was an old friend of your father‘s. And you don’t have to hide your powers from me, I know about your abilities.” Rei was surprised he knew about your powers. You nodded and went off to clean the inside of the temple. As you were walking, Mr. Hino said to Rei “Listen to me Rei. I know I said you were too young to date, but Sasuke is the one person I will let you date right now.” “Grandpa…” Rei shook her head. “I’m sure he has no interest in something like that.” “Don’t be so sure Rei. I can tell you like him and I'm sure he will feel the same for you soon.” he said as he walked away. Rei looked at you as you went inside. And with the help of your powers , you were able to clean up the temple easily. Once all the chores were finished, you jumped back to the top of the gate and laid back to relax for a bit.
1312111.title: The Next Day

13121111.content: Later on that day, you continued to relax in the sun when you heard Rei talk to you. “Hey Sasuke.” You looked down and saw Rei in some casual clothes. “I’m going to meet the others in town, you want to come along?” You jumped down and landed right in front of Rei. “Sure. I would love to.” You said as the two of you went to town. You met up with the others at some kind of café, and you all had a nice peaceful talk. Rini and Serena kept arguing, but you got used to that really quickly. But as you were all getting ready to order, a large number of explosions came from the city. You and the others put that order on hold for a moment and you all rushed off to the location of the explosions. Little did you know that the one behind this attack, was much stronger than ever before.
13121111.title: Later

131211111.content:
(Blackheart) (His armor http://media.photobucket.com/image/korag...)

As you and the others were running, the girls had already changed into the Sailor Scouts, you remained the same being you had no reason to hide who you were. When you got to the city, you and the girls were surrounded by hundreds of monsters. “What are these things?” “Hideaks.” “What?” “They’re foot soldiers of the Underworld. They currently serve Blackheart.” “Did somebody call my name?” you all heard a demonic voice say. You looked up and saw Blackheart in his demon form. “Blackheart! At last I can take you down!” Blackheart just laughed. “You fool, you cannot defeat me.” “I can handle your demon form.” “Who says you would be dealing with my demon form?” “What?” “You see, I have found a much more powerful form at my disposal, thanks to the Master’s dark magic. Behold!” he said as his body began to transform. His body was surrounded by armor, which seemed very familiar to you. “What the hell?” “Behold the true power I possess!” “I know that armor, that’s the armor of the Wolf Warrior.” “Yes, but this is the Masters copy. He entrusted me with it and I will use it to destroy you!” he said as he drew his sword. “Girls, you will have to deal with the Hideaks alone. Blackheart is mine.” you said as you charged at him. “Come on!” he said as he prepared to fight you at the top of the buildings. “Alright girls, let’s show them what we can do.” And they attacked the Hideaks while covering each other’s backs. After about ten minutes, they cleared out the Hideaks. But they noticed several small explosions coming from the rooftops. Rei was a little worried about you. “You think he’s okay?” “I’m sure he’s fine Rei.” “Yeah, you have to remember how strong he is.” “He’ll beat that creep!” But then, a much larger explosion came from the roof and the girls saw you go through three buildings before you hit the ground. They ran up to you and Rei picked your head up off the ground. “Sasuke, are you alright?” You tried to stand up, but you had quite a bit of trouble doing so. “You see Sasuke? You are no match for the power of the Master! I will let you live for now, but only because I want more of a challenge from you.” he said as he was about to leave. But in an instant you charged at him yelling “Get back here!” He quickly turned around and slashed your chest with his sword, sending you back to the ground. “You are persistent, I will give you that, but you are still no match for me. Farewell.” he said as he vanished into the shadows. You once again tried to stand up, but the pain was too great for you and you passed out and fell to the ground. Rei ran up to you and asked for the girls help in getting you back to the temple. They agreed and they changed back before getting you back to the temple.
131211111.title: Blackheart Returns

1312111111.content: Back at the temple, Rei sat by your side as you were out cold. Mr. Hino saw the damage that happened to you and wondered what happened, but he never asked Rei about it. Five hours passed an you were still out cold. Rei was worried that you wouldn’t wake up at all. But in that moment, you came to and Rei was both relieved and extremely happy. Once you sat upright, Rei gave you a hug and you blushed a little. “Sasuke, you gave me quite the scare.” “I’m sorry about that Rei.” The two of you smiled at each other and you decided to get some fresh air.
1312111111.title: At The Temple

13121111111.content: Later that night, you looked up at the moon and remembered the damage Blackheart had given you earlier today. You knew the only thing that could stop him would be the true Wolf Warrior armor. But you knew the armor would choose the one who wears it. So for now, you would have to train so you could fight Blackheart, but you decided to go back inside for now and sleep. As you slept that night, you were in front of the altar and Rei went in to do some fire readings. She saw you up against the wall and placed a sheet over you. She decided to put the fire reading on hold for now and went to bed herself.
13121111111.title: That Night

131211111111.content: The next day, you woke up and noticed the sheet around you. You knew Rei gave it to you as you slept. You then went outside to do some training. You first created about a thousand targets made of rock. You then create your chidori attack, but then waved your hand and attacked with the Chidori Senbon. Even though you hit every single target, you knew Blackheart would not be defeated that easily, not by a long shot. You continued to train up to the point where you were on one of your knees. “You really shouldn’t over do it.” You looked up and saw Rei. “Yeah, I know. But with Blackheart as strong as he is, I have to keep training.” “Oh no, you need to relax a little. Come on, we should meet with the others.” “Alright then.” you said standing up. You waited by the gate while Rei changed. She came out and the two of you went to meet with the others.
131211111111.title: The Next Day

1312111111111.content:
(Darien/Tuxedo Mask)

As you and Rei were walking in the city, you met up with the others outside a park. There you met Darien who was Serena's boyfriend, even though Rini did all she could to gwet in the way of that. And what was surprising to you was that Rini was the future daughter of Serena and Darien. All of you decided to have a little picnic and have some fun. And even though this wasn't your type of thing, you had to admit, it was fun. As ou were all eating everyone began to chat. "So Sasuke, how do you like it here?" "I have to admit, despite the attacks from the underworld, it's nice." "We're glad to have you here in the city." "Thank you." "And trust me, this city has plenty to offer." "I will take your word Darien." "We hope you stay Sasuke." "Thanks, maybe I will." you said as you took a drink of water. The picninc went really well, especially for Serena, who couldn't help but pig out. But once all the food was gone, a large number of Hideaks appeared and since there was no one else around, the girls and Darien changed for the fight.
1312111111111.title: A Day in the City

13121111111111.content: Once the others transformed, you all began to fight the Hideaks. Mina was able to keep them at bay with her love chains. Lita used her thunder to destroy them with ease. Serena and Rini were working together, while Darien was fighting awith Amy. You and Rei were a great fighting team. You both used the power of fire to work with her. The Hideaks were defeated easily. But your celebration was short lived. "Wolf Attack!" Just then, four wolf hears made of dark energy came at all of you and cause a nice amount of damage.You were all trying to get up when Blackheart came out. "Blackheart, I will take you down this time." "Go ahead and try." You then created your chidori in both hands. You then waved both of them and you ent a total of 2000 needles made of lightning at him. But sadly, it didn't do anything to him. "Impossible!" "You will need to do batter than that." "Try this!!" you said charging at him with your Chidori. He just chuckled and when you were in front of him, he managed to grab your and and force your attack into your side. "Sasuke!" "You are a fool to think you can defeat me." he said as he knocked you back a few feet and drew his sword. He manadged to make some deep cuts in your chest. But then he hit you with a powerful Wolf attack, sending you flying backwards. Rei ran up to you and prayed that you were aliright. "He is absolutely pathetic. I cannot believe he thinks he could avenge the Uchiha Clan with the level of power he has. He is nothing but trash." "Shut up! He is not trash! He is a great warrior and a great friend. And I will not let you talk about him that way! Mars Celestial Fire!" she said as she fired multiple rings of fire at Blackheart. Surprisingly it did a little damage to him. "If you ever talk about him like that again, I will take you down!" "Rei..." you said as you passed out from the pain and blood loss. "I will leave for now. But know this, when I get the chance, I will destroy you girl!" he said as he disappeared into the darkness. The girls got you ttemple as fast as they could.
13121111111111.title: Battle in the Park

131211111111111.content: Once they all got you to the temple, they noticed the hole in your side was almost completely healed. “Amazing.” “Sasuke is an incredibly fast healer.” “It must be because of his powers.” “That may be, but Blackheart is getting stronger by the day.” “If Sasuke is not able to do something. We will have to fight him ourselves.” “I agree. We have to fight for Sasuke.” And as if on cue, more screams came from the city and they knew what they had to do. They all changed and ran off to the location of the attack.
131211111111111.title: At the Temple

1312111111111111.content: As Darien and the girls ran towards the city, they found that only Blackheart was there this time. “I knew you would come if I caused enough trouble.” “You are going to get it for what you did to Sasuke.” “Bring it on my dear.” They all charged for Blackheart at the same time and they gave it their all. Venus wrapped him up with his love chains while Jupiter and Mars attacked with the combination of lightning and fire. It may have done some damage, but Blackheart was still playing around. “This is nuts! How are we supposed to beat this guy?” "You fools! You cant beat me!” he said as he broke free of the love chains and attacked the scouts. He was charging for Serena first, but Darien fought back with his cane that could go up against his sword. The two of them fought close range for a while and Blackheart was actually impressed, but he sent him back with a small burst of energy. “I will admit, all of you caused me some damage so I will let you live. But tell that fool Sasuke that if he challenges me, I will take him down with ease.” he said as he once again vanished into the darkness. Once he was gone, everyone decided to go back to the temple.
1312111111111111.title: The Scouts vs Blackheart

13121111111111111.content: As they returned to the temple, they noticed that you were gone! “Sasuke! Where is he?” “Rei, look.” Mina said handing her a note that was written by you. “Dear Sailor Scouts; I’m sorry, but I cannot stay. Blackheart is after me an me alone. So I will have gone to challenge him. I want to thank each and every one of you for all that you have done. Amy, your pursuit of knowledge is admirable. Lita, you have a good future in cooking. Mina, you are a very good singer, don’t give up on your dreams. Darien and Serena, you both have a bright future together. Enjoy every moment you spend with each other. And Rei…Thank you for everything. If I don’t come back, say good-bye to grandpa for me. Sasuke Uchiha.” Rei fell to her knees. “There’s nothing I can do. He’s gone.” “Aren’t you going after him?” “Why would I do that? I can’t stop him.” “Because he’s a total bomb. Because he has a special place in your heart.” “I know, but what can I do?” “If you lose him you will regret it for the rest of your life. You need to go Sasuke your true feelings, that you really like him.” “I don’t!” Tears began to fill her eyes. “But he’s nice to grandpa. And the temple’s a lot more fun since he came to stay!” “You love him…And I’m totally sure he feels the same for you.” "You think?” She slapped her back and said “Get after him and find out! Sorry about the slap I got so excited.” “When all else fails…” “Just tell the guy…” “That you do love him.” “Right, I just hope I’m not too late, thanks guys.” she thought as she ran off to find you, while the others split up and did the same. But in the forest not too far away from Rei’s location, you and Blackheart were staring each other down.
13121111111111111.title: The Search is On

131211111111111111.content: As soon as the two of you were finished staring each other down, Blackheart made the first move by sending a blast of dark energy towards you. You dodged and charged straight for him. He decided to fight with only his shield for now and the two of you for a while at close range. You managed to score a few blows but he continued to charge at you. “Phoenix Flower!” you said as you sent a large number of small fireballs towards him. He managed to use his shield to deflect them and even sent a few of them back at you. You endured the pain and charged at him. But unknown to you and Blackheart, Rei heard the commotion the two of you caused and she transformed into Sailor Mars and charged for the forest. But back with you, Blackheart was giving you such a beating. He soon landed a powerful punch that sent you through a couple of trees. He then drew his sword and got ready to impale you with the blade. But then, an arrow made out of fire shot the sword out of his hand and you both turned to find Rei. “Get away from him!” “You wish to take his place in battle?” “Yeah, you and me Blackheart!” He smiled and changed back into his weaker demon form, and the sword vanished. “Alright then, come on Sailor Mars!” he said jumping into the clearing. Rei followed him and the two of them got ready to clash.
131211111111111111.title: Sasuke Vs Blackheart

1312111111111111111.content:
(Your Morpher http://home.comcast.net/~ryu-kumon/forum...) (Your armor is a red version of Blackheart's)

As you struggled to get up, Rei fought against Blackheart with everything they had. She did cause a nice amount of damage with her basic attack. “You are better than I thought, but you will not defeat me!” he said as he fired a blast of black lightning at her. She managed to dodge and counter with her celestial fire. He began to grow frustrated and changed into his knight form. “Now things will be fun!” he said as he charged towards her. She had trouble dodging him at such close range at first, but she got used to his attacks. But he then used his wolf attack to take her by surprise and sent her flying. And as soon as she stood up, Blackheart charged at her with the perfect opportunity to impale her with his sword. “Now die!!” But in the last second, you pushed Rei to the side and you took the hit for her, right through the lung and a slice to your heart. “What?” You grabbed onto his wrist and said while blood flowed down the side of your mouth “Chaos Lightning!” you sent a massive amount of lightning into his body and caused him a great amount of damage. He managed to break free of your grip and jumped back with his sword and fell to his knees. “Sasuke!” she said running up to you and lifting the top half of your body off the ground. “That was meant for me.” You coughed up a little blood and said “No. How could I let you take that hit? Even if I survived, without you I would ever be happy again.” “Sasuke…” she said with tears in your eyes. “For the first time in ten years, I feel like I’m at home again, because of you and the others.” You began to cough up much more blood. “Sasuke, hang on!” “Rei, I need to tell you something. Something I have never said to anyone since my clans destruction.” you said placing your hand on her cheek. “Yes Sasuke?” “I…” Things started to go dark. “I…love…you.” But in that moment, your entire world went dark as you were close to leaving this world. “Sasuke, please don’t die! Rei was walking around the temple, trying to find you when she felt your sadness come from a nearby forest. She rushed over there.

"DAMN IT!" you yelled aloud "WHY RA? WHY DID YOU HAVE TO DIE? YOU WERE MY GUARDIAN, TEACHER AND FRIEND! WHY DID YOU HAVE TO GO?" You began to cry.
"(Name)." said a familiar voice. You turned round and saw Rei crying. "I'm sorry I couldn't do anything. It's my fault Ra is dead."
You knew she was right and it was her fault but you also knew Ra was getting old and would've passed away soon anyways.

You hugged Rei and she hugged you back.

"To look after you forever."
You hugged Rei even tighter.

"I guess I should wake her up." You moved your left arm over to Rei but then remembered what happened. You were being whipped by her. Thinking about that got you hot again. You ignored it and woke Rei up.

PEACE!" and Ra flew out.

134.content: One day, the scouts were fighing some creature from the negaverse. This monster was incredibly strong. Soon it was about to finish off Sailor Mars. But then the scouts heard someone yell "INFERNO FIRE BLAST!" Then a red energy blast struck the creature. ITt roared in pain and the scouts turned to see you and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon. "Who are you?" asked Sailor Mars. "The name is (Name)." you said. You then combined with the dragon and you fought the creature alone. You created a sword made of energy and sliced the monster in half. When it was destroyed, you went over to check on the scouts. "Are you OK?" you asked Mars. She nodded and asked you to come to her temple with the others. You agreed and you all went to the temple.
