You gave them an answer to their questions and Rei asked where you lived. "I don't have a home." you said. "I never stay in one place for very long." Rei was surprised and told you that you could stay at her temple. You acepted her offer and the others left to go home. Then Rei showed you around the temple and she showed you the guest room. You went inside and set your stuff down. It was pretty late, so you and Rei went to bed. But what you didn't know is that Rei sneaked into the guest room while you were asleep and kissed your cheek. Rei was madly in love with you.
1341.title: Rei's Temple

13411.content: The next day, you woke up at dawn to train. Rei woke up at the same to do her chores. While she was putting on her kimono, you were outside the temple doing push ups with your index finger while your body was in the air. Rei began to stare at you with lust. As you continued to train, Rei finished her chores and you used your index finger to push your body ten feet into the air. You landed on your feet right in front in Rei and she began to blush. But just as the two of you relaxed around eachother, you heard someone yell "BLACK LIGHTNING!" You picked Rei up and jumped into the air. When you were in the air, you saw a huge crater in the place where the two of you were standing. You landed on the Ground and gently placed Rei on the grond. You turned around and saw what seemed to be impossible; another you. But this one was different because his hair was white and his eyes were blood red. Rei was stunned by what she was eeing. "Who are you?" you asked. The other you began to chuckle evily and said in a demonic voice "I am you, or rather, your dark side. During the fight you had a year ago, Mariks mellennium rod split you into two beings; you and me. I have been growing over the years, haveing dark versions of every creature you have ever summoned. Including the Egyptian God Cards." You gasped and said "Impossible!" Your dark side laughed and said "Nothing is impossible. And by the way, my name is Blackheart. I just came here to give you a warning of the war between the two of us. Farewell!" Then a black portal opened from under Blackheart and he escaped.
13411.title: Dark Clone

134111.content: You calmed down a little bit and turned to Rei and asked "Are you alright Rei?" She nodded and you gave a huge sigh of relief. She then began to blush because she knew that you cared for her. But then she saw the fear in your eyes and asked you what was wrong. "Rei, we have an incredible fight on our hands." She was confused as to why that is and you said "Rei, the Egyptian God Cards are the strongest creatures in all of existance. The power the three monsters posses is unimaginable. Alone, they are strong. But together, they are unstoppable. If he has as much power as I do, he and I may end up..." You stopped. Rei had a bad feeling in her heart. But she wantd to forget about that for now and so did you. Then the two of you went inside the temple.
134111.title: Check on Rei

1341111.content: You were trying to figure out how on Earth you could defeat this clone. As you were pondering this, Rei sensed that you felt uneasy and went to make you feel better. As Rei was walking towards your room, she went inside and saw you were outside. she then walked towards you and thought you were enjoying the sunset, but then she heard you say to yourself "I can't stay here. As long as Blackheart is alive, Rei will be in constant danger. I would never forgive myself if anything happened to her. Rei, please don't think I'm just abandoning you." You were interupted by Rei when she said "I don't." You turned around to see Rei looking at you with concern. You said surprised "Rei, how long were you listening to what I was saying?" She told you that she heard everything. She then walked over to you and said "No matter what happens, we're in this together. For better or worse." She then placed her hand on your shoulder, but you turned around. "Rei," you said "I have to do this alone. I can't lose you. If anything happened to you...." you stopped. Rei then turned you around and kissed you full on the lips. She then wrapped her arms around you neck and you embraced her. The two of you were truely in love. After a few minutes, she broke the kiss and said "You are not doing this alone. You and I are going to fight this guy together." You embraced her and said "Thank you, Rei." But then the sun completely set and the two of you were pretty tired from the experiance the two of you had today. So the two of you kissed each other good night and went to bed.
1341111.title: Rei's Kiss

13411111.content: The next day, you woke up and went to check on Rei. You saw that she was asleep. You gave a big sigh of relief and went outside to enjoy the sunrise. As the sun began to rise, you were still very worried about Rei. You knew that Blackheart would come after the ones you love and care about. So it wasn't just Rei that was in danger, but the others were in danger as well. So you knew that you had to warn the others and get them to the temple. As the morning went by, Rei woke up and saw you standing at the top of the entrance to the temple. She just stared at you with lust and you noticed that she was awake. You jumped down and landed right in front of Rei. "Good morning my love." you said. Rei then told you good morning and you told her to call the other scouts. She asked why and you said "We need to warn them about Blackheart. They need to know what we are up against." She nodded and went inside the temple to call the other scouts. After a few minutes, the other scouts arrived and they asked what was going on. You told them about Blackheart and they were surprised. Then you told them that you would have a few of your creatures stay with them so that they could tell you when Blackheart appears. They agreed and you summoned a few creatures and they all went home.
13411111.title: The Next Day

13412.content: The next morning, you got up at dawn to train. You saw Rei come out in her kimono and she asked why you were up so early. "I could ask you the same thing." you said. She told you that she gets up this early for chores. "I see. I always get up this early to train." You soon began your training and Rei was watching you while she did her chores. When you were finished with your training, Rei called you over to her. You walked over to Rei and asked what she needed. You noticed that she was blushing and you began to blush as well. But as she was about to answer, you heard something coming from behind. You grabbed Rei and jumped out of the way. You looked at the spot where you were standing and saw claw marks in the concrete. You turned to see the Pitch-Black Werewolf. "I was wondering where you went my beast." you said. "I no longer serve you. I serve Mistress Morrigan now." the creature said. You transformed into a warrior called Black Luster Soldier and took a fighting stance. The werewolf pulled out two swords from behind its back ad charged towards you. The two of you clashed for quite some time. But as the fight continued, the werewolf began to get angry and said to you "I will bring you back to the Mistress, even if I have to bring you to her in pieces!" Then the monster charged at you, but then his body completely froze. "No. Please, forgive me Misstress, I didn't mean it! No please!" Then the werewolf was burned to ash and returned to its card form. You walked over to it and when you picked up the card, it turned to stone. "Well, whoever this Morrigan is, she wasn't very happy that he threatened me. She must be pretty smart to turn the card to stone. Now I can't track her down." you thought to yourself.
13412.title: The Message

135.content: Before we continue, do you want to do the combo, OR do you want to have Mina, Lita and Rei all to yourself? If you chose the Trio, it is a Chaos story.
135.title: Hold on

choices: You know, let's add some new powers to the list of choices.
1351.content: Now hold on for a minute here! Do you still want to go with a combination of the Sun and Chaos powers? Or do you want to mix things up a bit and add on some new powers? What do you say?
1351.title: Wait A Minute Here!

13512.content:
Want to go with a new set of powers to choose from, hmm? Well, why not. Now then, let's see what sort of powers we have available....how about we go with having the powers of the Spirit of Vengeance himself, Ghost Rider?

Think about it, you have superhuman strength, speed, stamina, reflexes, endurance, and durability. You're invulnerable to any kind of fire, can control Hellfire, summon a hellish motorcycle, as well as many more abilities at your disposal. So, what do you say?

However, you won't be in the shoes of previous Ghost Riders like Johnny Blaze, Danny Ketch, or Carter Slade. Instead, you will be a brand new Ghost Rider.
13512.title: New Set of Powers

choices: A dark source of energy, not originating from Hell.
A dark source of energy, not from this time period.
135121.content:
Japan, the Land of the Rising Sun. To the public, Japan was known for it's history, culture, giant monster movies, anime. But to you however, this island of a nation was your destination. As you were approaching the capital city of Tokyo via jumbo jetliner, you stowed away both yourself and you custom chopper motorcycle within the plane's cargo bay.

Little did the world knew, but you harbored a....dark secret. By day, you were an ordinary guy, standing nearly 6 foot 1 in height, having an athletic frame, and sporting a pair of green eyes and "dirty blonde" hair. But by night or in the presence of evil, your appearance changes, as you transform into the hellish Spirit of Vengeance, known only as "The Ghost Rider".

Armed with Hellfire and various weapons at your disposal, as the Ghost Rider, you seek out those who have spilt innocent blood and judge them as both judge, jury, and executioner. If they are deemed guilty, you unleash a Ghost Rider's ultimate weapon; Penance Stare. Upon use, the Penance Stare will unleash all of the pain and suffering the person has caused against them tenfold, burning the enemy's soul to a brimstone crisp.

Though, as the plane as fly just above the Tokyo skyline and reaching the airport, you figured that it's time to leave before someone at the airport discovers you. Opening the charge bay doors, as the wind blew fiercely and with relentless gust, you got on your custom chopper, revved on the throttle, as the engine roared and growled to life. Noticing that it was already nightfall, you let a slight smirk and thought, "Well Tokyo, hope you're ready for someone like me." Flooring the throttle, your chopper went from 0 to 80 miles an hour in merely 4 seconds, just as you and your motorcycle were left falling mid-air.

Shortly after ejecting from the large plane, Hellfire consumed both you and the two-wheel vehicle, as your skin & flesh disappeared in the blaze, turning you into a flaming skeleton with somewhat charred bones. The trenchcoat, stonewashed jeans, black boots, and dark gray T-shirt became charred and crispy, but still as flexible. The sawed-off pump-action shotgun, dual revolvers, and chain that was hoisted on your body morphed into your Hellfire Revolvers, Hellfire Shotgun, & Hellfire Chain.

Finally, as your motorcycle grotesquely transformed itself into your HellCycle, within those short few seconds mid-air and you had transformed into the Ghost Rider, as you crashed through the building in front of you, still sitting upon your HellCycle, where you drifted to slow your momentum down.

Despite giving the people on the floor that you landed on, as the Ghost Rider, you got a good look at the city in front of you. However, as for your reasons here in Tokyo, you came here to investigate....
135121.title: Arriving In The Land Of The Rising Sun!

choices: Prisma tries to break herself free.
The Sailor Scouts, Catsy, Birdy, & Avery intervene.
1351212.content:
A few days ago, you recieved an unexpected bust from the very person who made you into the Ghost Rider; the demon lord known as "Mephisto". He made you into the infamous Spirit of Vengeance from a single deal, and so far he kept up with his end of the bargain, while you kept up with your end.

However, as for why he decided to pay you a visit, Mephisto wasn't exactly there to have a nice conversation. From what he told Mephisto's "assets" had sensed some weird disturbances occurring within the city of Tokyo. At first, you thought that this claim was a little ludicrous, but when the disguised demon lord explained it to you that these disturbances had an essence of dark energy but not originating from Hell nor from this current time period, that was when you raised an eyebrow saying "Okay, that definitely sounds weird. And what did you mean from it didn't come from this time period? Is it something from the past or the future?".

"That's what I want you to find out, Rider." was Mephisto's response, just before he disappeared completely when the lights went out. However, seeing as how from seeing Mephisto's concern about the situation, you figured you had to head down toward Japan and see for yourself.

Fast forward to present day, as you sat there on your HellCycle, you could sense another disturbance with your demonic abilities. You weren't sure what it was, but it was as if something was draining an innocent soul. Although you don't exactly have eyebrows as the Ghost Rider, you let out a demonic angry growl from whoever or whatever it was that was consuming human souls, which still counts as spilling innocent blood in your opinion.

Then, you revved on the throttle of your HellCycle, causing the demonic chopper to let out a mix between hellish screams and demonic growls and roars from it's engines, as your wheels of Hellfire spun with rage. Then, as the HellCycle went from 0 to 160 miles an hour in a mere 2 seconds, you went out of another window, off of the side of the building, landing on several buildings, and landing onto an elevated highway, all while leaving a blazing trail of fire in the process.

You wanted answers as to what was happening, and you were going to get them, even if you had to use Penance Stare on whoever's responsible to make them talk. Getting closer to the source of the disturbance, you noticed that the energy disruption was coming from a large suspension just ahead of you, just as you saw a few explosions upon the main suspension cables.

But as you got closer to the bridge, you could see that there was a gruesome battle going on. However, you could tell who the villains were, and who was winning. Pulling out your Hellfire Chain, you aimed at the woman, known as "Prisma", who was firing dark energy blasts at a group of teenage heroines, known as "The Sailor Scouts".

But as you whipped your Hellfire Chain around Prisma's legs and violently yanked her down hard, the Sailor Scouts and the others saw you, just as you whipped the tail of your HellCycle to come to a full stop. From there, you got off your hellish motorcycle, still holding onto the other end of your Hellfire Chain, as you slowly turned your flaming skull of a head, looking at the shocked group of women, with eyeless sockets.

From the Sailor Scouts' perspective, along with that of the reformed Catsy, Birdy, and Avery, they saw that whatever you were, you weren't classified as "human". "Sailor Mercury, any luck with scanning this creep?" The Sailor Scout in red, known as Sailor Mars, asked, as you noticed a Sailor Scout in blue, known as Sailor Mercury, scanning you with some visor from where she stood.

Then, just as you noticed Prisma slowly getting back up(not to mention pissed off from getting yanked to the ground), Sailor Mercury's visor was done scanning you, as she had a look of disbelief on her face as she looked back at her comrades and replied, "Well, despite my scanners only say unknown, whatever he is, this flaming skeleton isn't even human!"

But then, Prisma unleash another blast of dark energy at you with that Nega Moon Crystal strobe of hers yelling, "Human or not, you'll pay for interfering with me!" Instinctively, you quickly yank the Hellfire Chain back toward you, as you swung the enchanted chain around like a whip, successfully deflecting the incoming bolts of dark energy with extreme efficiency, despite the Sailor Scouts and their friends had to dodge out of the way.

As Prisma threw the deal energy blasts at a faster pace, you kept up with her attacks, deflecting them at superhuman speeds. But suddenly, you quickly grabbed one of your Hellfire Revolvers and fired off two shots at Prisma. Fortunately, one of those shots scorched her in the hand that was holding the Nega Moon Strobe, knocking the evil weapon out of her possession.

Shortly after disarming her, you quickly aimed your Hellfire Chain at Prisma's legs, whopping the end around both of the Nega Moon woman's lower limbs, then yank her off her feet once more. From there, you pulled on the Hellfire Chain with inhuman strength, putting Prisma just in front of you.

But before she could even react, you put your left boot down on Prisma's neck, immobilizing her like a mongoose attacking a snake. Then, as you sheathed your Hellfire Revolver and pulled out your Hellfire Shotgun, you aimed the demonic firearm right in front of Prisma's face, to the point where the barrel was literally touching her skin. However, since you could sense that her soul was a mix between innocent and guilty due the Nega Moon energy tainting her spirit, you looked down at Prisma as the Hellfire Chain slithered up your free arm and wrapped itself around your unoccupied limb, you let out a demonic growl toward the green-haired woman and growled, "GIVE ME ONE GOOD REASON THAT I SHOULDN'T SEND YOUR DAMNED SOUL STRAIGHT TO HELL."
1351212.title: Enemies From A Dark Future

choices: Actually, something interrupts you & the Sailor Scouts. Who was it?
13512122.content:
Although, despite you had your own left boot upon Prisma's throat in a dominant fashion, you though that the female greenette didn't say anything. But then, just as you were ready to pull on the trigger of your Hellfire Shotgun, you suddenly heard not just the voices of Catsy, Birdy, and Avery, but also the voices of the Sailor Scouts and their two feline companions, as they all spoke in unison and yelled, "No, don't hurt her!"

This event alone made you completely stop dead in your tracks. After all, out of all of the crazy stuff you have experienced as the Ghost Rider, this was something entirely new. So, in order to get some answers, you slowly but surely turned your flaming skull to the left to face the Sailor Scouts and their comrades, speaking to them in the Ghost Rider's demonic voice and said, "FIRST, YOU'RE ENEMIES, AND NOW YOU'RE FRIENDS! WHY WOULD YOU EVEN WANT TO SPARE SOMEONE WITH SUCH A TAINTED SOUL LIKE HERS?!"

"First off, Bonehead; she's not a 'tainted soul'! And second, her name's Prisma, and she's our sister!" Birdy replied, feeling like you calling Prisma a "tainted soul" as an insult. Then again, hearing Birdy calling you "Bonehead" felt like an insult on your behalf. In response, you let out a growling scoff at the group and answered, "SISTERS?! THE LAST TIME I CHECKED, SISTERS DON'T TRY TO KILL EACH OTHER!"

However, during the conversation, Sailor Mars used her abilities as a priestess to sense what exactly was she and her friends dealing with, since she figured that you might be something supernatural when Amy's scanners can't figure out what you are. And it turns out, she was right; you were some sort of supernatural entity, as she heard Avery speak to you and said, "That's because it wasn't her fault, Prisma was being controlled by that Nega Moon strobe! It was making her act like that, she wasn't always like this!"

Then, butting into the conversation, Sailor Mars tried to convince you to spare the female greenette as she answered, "Look, I don't know what you are or where you came, but Avery's right! Prisma wasn't acting this way out of her own will, that strobe was doing this to her."

Although you were allowed to kill those who got in your way as the Ghost Rider, you had a bit of a moral compass, especially since you can sense that the Sailor Scouts legitimately possessed real pure souls, which made you hesitant in attacking them. However, from reviewing the information revealed to you, you connected the dots and figured out that Mephisto and his assets were right; there were darker forces at work here within Tokyo, Prisma and her 3 sisters happened to be good people that were simply used as pawns, nothing more.

"SO...IT IS TRUE AS WHAT THEY SAY; POWER CAN CORRUPT YOU IF YOU'RE NOT TOO CAREFUL." You replied, turning your eyeless gaze toward the Nega Moon Strobe, still laying there on the asphalt, just a few yards away. Although it was no longer in Prisma's clutches, you could sense a dark power inside it's crystal ball, a power that was too dangerous for anyone to use, good or evil.

Focusing on the strobe itself, you put your boot off of Prisma's neck and throat, allowing her to breathe, letting out a few coughs in the process before falling unconscious. But as you were inches away from the strobe, the Sailor Scouts thought you were going to grab it. But instead, you raised your right boot just above the dark strobe, and stomped down hard on it in one blow, crushing the gem powering it in the process. Finally, just for good measure, you kept your boot stamped down on the crushed gem of power, as you twisted your boot from left to right, grinding the gem pieces into nothing but dust.

From seeing what you did, the Sailor Scouts were still unsure on what they were going up against. But from seeing attacks, power, and appearance, they could understand that whatever you were, you happened to be a powerful entity. However, when you were looking back the Sailor Scouts, you heard the Sailor Scout in green, known as Sailor Jupiter, speak to you and said, "So, you're not working with Rubeus?"

Despite you didn't know who this "Rubeus" guy was, but you had a feeling that he might the person responsible for these dark energy disturbances you have sensed when you first came here to this city. In response to what Sailor Jupiter had said to you, you spoke with the Ghost Rider's demonic voice and replied, "I DON'T KNOW THIS RUBEUS BASTARD IS, BUT IF I WANTED YOU LADIES 6 FEET UNDER..." Unexpectedly, in mid-sentence, you changed back from your Ghost Rider Form into your Human Form before their very eyes, as you then finished what you were saying and said, "...I would've done so the very second I came into view. So, care to explain to me who you girls are, exactly?"

Shortly after you said those words, you crossed your arms, just as Sailor Mars looked at you and replied, "Oh, um...we're the Sailor Scouts, Defenders of Love and Justice! I'm Sailor Mars, that's Sailor Moon, Sailor Mercury, Sailor Venus, and Sailor Jupiter. The ladies over there are Catsy, Birdy, and..well, I'm sure you're familiar with who Avery and Prisma are."

"And speaking of introductions, who are you, anyway? We've seen anybody else with the type of power you have." Sailor Venus asked, speaking out for her own curiosity. Though you couldn't blame them for wanting some answers themselves. After all, you literally just came out of nowhere and "helped" them out, so you figured that they wanted to know what you were and why you just turned into a flaming skeleton.

Figuring that it would be better to tell them sooner rather than later, you looked at Sailor Mars and her fellow Sailor Scouts and answered, "*sigh* It's a long story, Sailor Scouts. But to put it out plain and simple; I'm the Ghost Rider. A Spirit of Vengeance, to be precise. When the Sun is up and about, I'm as alive as you 5 heroines. But when the Sun goes down or evil lurks nearby, I turn into what you saw just recently; a living skeleton coated in Hellfire, whose purpose is to seek out those who have spilled innocent blood...and send those bastards straight to Hell to burn for eternity. So yeah, I'm an anti-hero."

Upon reaction to hearing what you had explained to them, the Sailor Scouts were in a mix between shock, awe, and disbelief. "Wow. Just...wow." Sailor Jupiter said, still relaying the fact that you unintentionally had just told the Sailor Scouts the Hell actually exists. Then, you noticed Sailor Moon becoming worried somewhat as she replied, "Yeah, couldn't this get any worse? First, we have to deal with the Nega Moon, now we have to worry about demons coming out of Hell!"

Obviously seeing the concern on Sailor Moon's face, you tried to calm her down and answered, "Whoa whoa, hold on! First off, Hell isn't going to invade, Sailor Moon! And second, I came here because some friends of mine have sensed some disturbances here in your city. Obviously from what my allies had told me, they don't know jack about what these disturbances are, or where they came from. Not to mention one of my allies thought that these disruptions had not come from our current time period."
13512122.title: Convincing The Spirit of Vengeance

choices: Fast forward to tomorrow noon, where you met up with the other Sailor Scouts.
Fast forward a few days, where you got to know the Sailor Scouts a bit better.
135121221.content:
Although you still kept your attention on the Sailor Scouts, you noticed that Catsy and Birdy were helping out Avery carry the unconscious Prisma off of the bridge road, propping the greenette up into a knelt sitting position. From there, you heard Catsy speak out toward Sailor Moon and her fellow Sailor Scouts as the former villainess said, "Sailor Moon, can you heal our sisters? I think they're ready!"

Obviously this got your attention as well, as you noticed that Avery slumped down onto her knees in exhaustion, possibly due to she was hit hard when Prisma was using that evil Nega Moon Strobe, prior to your arrival on the scene. "So, what? You plan on purifying their souls or something?" You asked to Sailor Moon, with a sarcastic and skeptical one in your voice.

However, it wasn't until you saw the look of seriousness in Sailor Moon's eyes, despite showing a gentle and compassionate smile, that you could see that the blonde pig-tailed Sailor Scout was indeed serious, causing your sarcastic demeanor to fade, as she slowly approached the 4 women on the sidelines. Then, you looked at Sailor Mars and said, "She's serious, isn't she?" "When it comes to her friends, Sailor Moon can be really serious, Mr..."

"-(IYNH). You can just call me (IYNH), Sailor Mars." You answered, as you then suddenly sensed a great deal of power coming from Sailor Moon, revealing her famed Silver Moon Crystal, where she aimed the crystal locket at Prisma and Avery, saying the words, "Moon Crystal Healing..Activation!!"

Upon saying those words, a powerful blast of pure light hit Prisma and Avery simultaneously on impact. And yet, the blast wasn't harming them, but purifying their tainted souls of dark negative energy. Although you figured that Sailor Moon has some good experience with using that crystal's power, you had to shield yourself a bit from the crystal's light.

After all, even though you were on the same side as them, your powers as the Ghost Rider were completely different from the Sailor Scouts, grunting a bit from the light emanating from the Silver Moon Crystal, as you growled, "Agh! Damn, that's bright!" Noticing your reaction from Sailor Moon using the Silver Moon Crystal, Sailor Mars and Sailor Mercury approached you with some worry, wondering what was wrong with you, as Sailor Mars grabbed you a bit and asked, "(IYNH), are you alright?"

But then, as Sailor Moon had finished her handiwork in purifying Avery's and Prisma's souls with her Silver Moon Crystal, you stopped shielding yourself, noticing how Sailor Mars and Sailor Mercury were concerned about your well-being. So in response, you slowly stood up, looked at Sailor Mars, and answered, "*grunt* I'm fine, Sailor Mars. It's just that I'm a tiny bit more sensitive to powerful light-based attacks. Heh, I guess I forgot about that part."

Even though she and Sailor Mercury backed away knowing that you were now fine, Sailor Mars could see that you had a slight weakness to light-based attacks, but would've been in worse if they were weapons forged from Heaven, seeing as how the Ghost Rider's powers & abilities were demonic in nature.

After you cracked your neck a bit to snap yourself out of your stunned daze, you turned around to face the Sailor Scouts once more, seeing that they were now more focused on you. From there, Sailor Venus looked at you, putting a hand on her hip, and said, "So, I'm guessing you plan on making an alliance with us, don't you?"

To be honest, that was sort of your plan when you first met the Sailor Scouts, seeing as how both you and them have a common enemy. And as the saying goes, "The enemy of my enemy is my friend". So in response, you just scratched the back of your head in confusion and replied, "H-How the hell did you girls know that I was going to say that? And don't say that it was a woman's intuition, because I was being subtle about it!"

Seeing your reaction made Sailor Moon and Sailor Jupiter chuckle about it, just as you suddenly heard an older but unfamiliar female voice that said, "In other words, an alliance would be most acceptable." Upon hearing the voice, you looked from left to right, then looked at the Sailor Scouts and said, "Okay...um, did you girls just heard that or is it just me?" Then, out of nowhere, another voice joined in, only it sounded more like a guy, and said, "Look down here, Bonehead!"

Obviously becoming a little annoyed being called Bonehead, you quickly looked down and saw the black and white cats Luna and Artemis. At first, you thought you were just hearing things, but it was then that Artemis spoke and said, "What, you've never seen a talking cat before?"

"Well...this is..completely new. Talking cats. Greeeaaat!" You answered, obviously not expecting something like this, as you leaned your head up toward the moonlit sky in disbelief for a second or two, before you then Luna speak and said, "Well, at least he isn't fainting out of pure shock from seeing us talk, Artemis." "Duly noted, Luna. Duly noted." Artemis replied, agreeing with his fellow feline about you not fainting right off the bat.

"Though, Luna does raise a valid point. An alliance would help, seeing as our enemy happens to be much stronger than the usual monsters we face." Sailor Mercury answered, agreeing with what Luna had said. But soon, one by one, the Sailor Scouts mostly agreed with having you as an ally, as Sailor Venus looked at you and said, "Well, I guess that settles it; Having a guy who can turn into a flaming skeleton it is, then." "What she means is 'Welcome to the Sailor Scouts, (IYNH)!' It's not much, but our base is at the Cherry Hill Temple, just in case you're wondering where we go to when we're not fighting the NegaVerse." Sailor Jupiter replied, making things a little easy to understand, despite you understood Venus's sarcasm from earlier.

However, despite your different set of powers, you were now officially a member of the Sailor Scouts, along with receiving the location of their base of operations; an old but still-occupied building known as the "Cherry Hill Temple". So far, so good on making some progress. Although it wasn't much, but it was a good start.
135121221.title: Starting To Get Some Answers

choices: "We go find those new friends of yours and talk to them, of course."
"Simple: we find Rubeus, grab him, and make him talk."
1351212211.content:
12 hours later, you were traveling on your custom motorcycle, reverted back from being in it's HellCycle form from the previous night, making your way to the location of the Cherry Hill Temple, the secret base of operations for the Sailor Scouts. Although you just got here to Tokyo, they managed to point out it's location before they helped Catsy & Birdy with Avery and Prisma, just as you went off into your HellCycle and drove off into the night, going your separate ways for the time.

Anyway, getting back to what was currently happening. As you drove through the streets of Tokyo, you remembered where the Cherry Hill Temple was located at as best as you could. However, it wasn't exactly easy with becoming adjusted to how traffic goes in Japan, seeing as how the flow in each traffic lane was inverted, compared to the flow of car traffic back in the States.

Finally, after taking about an hour or two, you finally made it to the location of the Cherry Hill Temple, stopping just in front of the temple's line of stairs. Although you had to learn the entire Japanese language to understand some or most of the chicken scratch they call words while on the plane ride to Tokyo, you looked at the plaque on the stone wall by the stairs that read "Cherry Hill Temple" in Japanese.

Fortunately, you managed to understand what the chicken scratch said, as you let out a slight smirk and answered, "Well, this is the place, I guess." From there, you parked your ride by the sidewalk, kicking the kickstand up, as you got off your chopper and approached the stairs. But as you ascended up the flight of stone stairs, you noticed a pair of crows perched upon a white Japanese gateway, looking at you with curiosity and ferocity, almost if they were the temple's guardians. Now you see why Crows and Ravens are the messengers of death.

However, as you got up to the top of the stone staircase, you noticed how big the place was. The temple was built as a hybrid mix between a Japanese shrine temple & a one-story house, with a courtyard on one side, and a Japanese garden on the other. You could tell that whoever owned this temple, obviously had put a lot of hard work into it's creation.

Other than seeing an old man and a male brunette in his mid 20s both wearing hakamas and talking to each other, you weren't sure where the Sailor Scouts were at. So, you decided to check inside the temple itself, as you approached the building's front door and slide it open. Although you could hear the faint noises of the Sailor Scouts' conversation, you decided to make your presence known to them and said, "Hey, Sailor Scouts! You girls in here? It's me, (IYNH), the Ghost Rider!"

That was when heard Sailor Mars's voice as she replied, "We're in the living room, (IYNH)!" But then, as you stepped foot upon the hardwood flooring of the Cherry Hill Temple interior, Sailor Mars spoke to you unexpectedly and said, "And take those boots of yours off! I just cleaned that floor!" Obviously trying to avoid invoking Sailor Mars's wrath, you did what she ordered and took off your boots as you replied, "Sorry! This is what happens when you grow up in the States like me, since I'm not used to Japanese traditions and all that weird stuff, Sailor Mars!"

Then, just after you took your black boots off and laid them beside the other pairs of shoes, leaving you in your socks, you walked toward where Sailor Mars was located at inside the temple. Luckily, as you went to the right, you found where Sailor Mars was at in the temple.

However, you noticed that Sailor Mars wasn't wearing her Sailor Scout outfit from last night. Instead, she was wearing a red hakama around her lower half, along with some white socks. But on her upper body, she wore a white long-sleeved robe shirt, with the bottom tucked into her red hakama pants. Other than that, Sailor Mars wasn't wearing her tiara, red star earrings, and her red high heels.

Then, Sailor Mars looked at you and said, "Just so you know, (IYNH), don't call me Sailor Mars when we aren't fighting the Nega Moon. But you can call me by my real name. It's Raye." "Well, at least it's better than just calling you Sailor Mars all the time, Raye." You answered, as you then noticed that Raye wasn't the only Sailor Scout present.

Laying against a nearby wall, sitting on the floor Indian-style, a short bluenette you recognized as Sailor Mercury, was currently using a laptop. Like Raye, Sailor Mercury wasn't in her Sailor Scout outfit either, wearing a casual outfit. Also sitting on the floor Indian-style, was Sailor Venus, wearing a casual outfit as well, as she was petting Artemis along his back. Then, you noticed Sailor Moon wearing just some shorts, white socks, and a short-sleeved button-up shirt, laying against some pillows while reading a few manga books.

Obviously not expecting something like this, you sat down by Raye and said, "So...this is Sailor Scout HQ, huh?" "Well, it isn't much, (IYNH)...but it gets the job done. That's Amy over on the computer, that's Mina over there petting Artemis, the girl behind us reading my comics is Serena, and if you're looking for Lita, she's outside getting some practice into her punches and kicks." Raye answered, giving you the real names of each of the other Sailor Scouts.

Then, you noticed a map of the entire city of Tokyo, marked out with black crescent moons at specific locations in the city, left out upon a coffee table. Curiously, you turned your head to look at Raye and said, "I'm guessing that you're using this map as a way to point where these Nega Moon guys attacked, right?"

"Yeah, it was Luna's idea to map out each of their previous attacks. However, even with the concept of cataloguing each attack they had unleashed, we can't figure out what their motives are in attacking each location." Amy replied, all while keeping her eyes on the laptop monitor. From what you could see, the Sailor Scouts had a bit of a snag figuring out the Nega Moon's motives.

Getting a better examination, you picked up the map, looking at the area. Amy was right about one thing though; the places that each recieved an attack from the Nega Moon were either separate from one another by dozens of city blocks, or very close enough to touch one another. "Although each of these were attacked by those Nega-scum, we managed to get rid of their negative energy in each area." Raye said, giving you a little more insight into the Sailor Scouts' fight against the Nega Moon forces.

"Though your friend's right about one thing, Raye; These Nega Moon guys' attack patterns look random, almost as if they're...." You replied, as you suddenly felt those gears in your mind grinding, realizing what their plans might be. From there, you suddenly grabbed a red marker, as you started connecting some of the points. Obviously thinking you might be going a little crazy, Raye lurched up from her position on the furniture as she growled, "What are you doing?!"

From there, it got the attention of the other Scouts, as they approached the two of you to see what you were doing with the map. It was when you were finished that you showed what each location meant, as you laid the map back down on the table and answered, "It's a theory, but I think I know what the Nega Moon is doing."

Upon looking at your handiwork, the attack locations all connected into what appeared to be a 5-point star. It was then that Luna appeared and jumped up onto the table, looked at what you did, looked up at you, and asked, "I'm guessing that this is your theory, (IYNH)?"

From there, you stood up and slowly paced around a bit and answered, "Look, I don't have as much experience in fighting these scumbags as you, girls. But I do know one thing though; Whatever Rubeus and whoever he's working for are planning, it's got something to do with what's happening in the present. As for why they've been attacking these places, it's got something to do with their plans."

At first, your theory sounded a little...ludicrous. However, out of all the other Sailor Scouts, Raye was actually starting to think that your theory actually would make sense in the enemy's attacks, as she spoke and said, "Look, to be honest girls, I...I think (IYNH) here might actually be onto something!"

From hearing this, the other Scouts were a little surprised upon hearing Raye's response, as Lita spoke to Raye and said, "Okay, first saving Catsy, and now this? Raye, I think you might be going a little bonkers on us here." "Actually, I agree with both Raye and (IYNH) here on this matter, Lita. Think about it; the Nega Moon has attacked each of the places we had visited. The Chess Tower, the Supermarket, a Cosmetics Shop, even here at the Cherry Hill Temple!" Amy answered, obviously agreeing with your theory actually making sense.

"Exactly, Amy! Whatever these Nega Moon jerks are planning, it's really, really big!And as my Uncle once told me, 'Nothing is as simple as it seems'. And so far, he's on a winning streak here. Whatever their plans are, we gotta put an end to it. Fast!" You replied, ready to head out to find answers. But then, Raye grabbed your and said, "Hold on there, Rider! We don't even know where to start, how do you expect to find Rubeus and stop him and the NegaMoon's plans?" However, in response, you turned your head to look at Raye & her friends, displaying a sly smirk on your face and answered...
1351212211.title: High Noon At The Cherry Hill Temple

13512122111.content:
"You remember those four women, Catsy, Birdy, Avery, & Prisma?" You said, as you turned around to face Raye and her friends. "Of course, (IYNH)! ....wait a second, you want to interrogate them, don't you?! No way you're using them to get some answers!" Raye yelled, suddenly realizing what your plan was, furiously rejecting your idea, as Lita joined in on the argument and said, "Yeah, (IYNH). Haven't they been through enough as it is?"

"Okay first off, girls; I am not trying to interrogate those 4 sisters! I just want to talk to them, and I treat people fairly. 'Do unto others as they do unto you', right? Think about it; they were once working for Rubeus before they defected, correct? Maybe they might know a few things that we missed. I'm not gonna sugarcoat it, but we're basically stumbling around in the dark without knowing what Rubeus and his superiors' plans are, other than that they're playing for keeps!" You answered, being both calm and stern at the same time, as you put the grim truth out plain and simple to them.

Shortly after saying your words to them, there was this eerie moment of silence between you and the Sailor Scouts. Although you were just being honest with them to gain their trust, you unintentionally forgot that the truth can sometimes hurt. So, in an effort to amend things with the group, you let out a long sigh and said, "Look, I'm...sorry for being harsh on you girls, but it's the honest but dark truth. Whether you like it or not, Sailor Scouts. I care about the fate of this world as much as you girls, but seeing when those scumbags get away with harming innocents and taunting us like they're untouchable really pisses me off."

Although you did apologize to the Sailor Scouts for the truthful outburst, Raye...actually felt something toward you. At first, she thought it was sympathy, since you care about the world and want to protect it from the dark forces you're both currently facing against. But then, Raye's own heartbeat slightly increased in pace, almost as if...she was starting to fall in love with you. "Whoa whoa whoa! Me, falling in love with (IYNH)? Get a hold of yourself, Raye!" Raye thought to herself, trying to snap herself out of it.

Then, shortly after snapping out of her near-daydream daze, Raye looked at you with a pair of serious eyes and answered, "Fine, you can talk to them. But under only two conditions!" "Hm. Okay Raye, shoot." You said, crossing your arms, having a feeling that Raye's making a deal with you to talk to Catsy and her sisters under certain conditions.

From there, as her fellow Sailor Scouts watched the powder keg of a small but important argument between you and their fiery comrade, Raye spoke to you and growled, "First off, if you're having a 'talk' with Catsy and her 3 sisters, me and the other Sailor Scouts are coming along with you. And second, if you ever, EVER hurt them in anyway possible, we're sending you back to whoever your friends are, in bandages! Is that understood?!"

"*sigh* That's fair enough, I guess." You replied, noticing how protective she was of Catsy and her female siblings, since she was directing that infamous bad temper of hers at you, literally putting the phrase "Hell hath no fury like a woman's scorn" to shame. So, in an attempt to avoid making that temper of hers erupt even more, you uncrossed your arms, extended your right hand out a bit to shake Raye's hand on agreeing with her conditions.

In response, Raye grabbed your extended hand with her own appendage, and shook it as she said, "Good choice." Shortly after letting go of your hand, Raye went to her own bedroom to change out of her Miko outfit and into something more casual, where you thought to yourself and said, "Wow. Now I see why she's Sailor Mars; she's got some roaring flames for a soul. hehe, my kind of girl."

When she done getting dressed, Raye was now wearing a pair of jeans, sneakers, an orange long-sleeve shirt, and white jacket. As you put your black boots back on, you heard Amy call Birdy to have her and the other sisters meet you and the other Scouts at...
13512122111.title: Making A Compromise

choices: Avery wanted to know what you had become last night...
Luna & Artemis called to warn about a "Droid" attacking somewhere nearby...
135121221112.content:
Fast forward to an hour later, you and the other Sailor Scouts rendezvous with Catsy, Birdy, Avery, and Prisma at one of Tokyo's larger parks. However, you arrived there minutes before Raye and her friends have, due to your mode of transportation, while they were forced to take the bus as a form of transportation, since neither actually own a car, let alone have the knowledge to drive one yet.

Fortunately, just as expected, Catsy and her fellow siblings arrived as well, as you saw Raye and the others greet them with handshakes and hugs, noticing how friendly the four sisters were toward the Sailor Scouts. But then, Amy spoke toward Prisma and said, "It's good to see you're feeling much better, Prisma. So, how does it feel to be free from Rubeus?" "I feel relieved to say the least. My sisters and I started up our own make-up business." Prisma replied, just as Catsy then remarked, "Yeah, too bad Birdy's been using our products."

In response, Birdy fired back at her sibling and answered, "What? I was only testing them, Catsy!" Of course, the four sisters and the Sailor Scouts couldn't help but have a chuckle about such a minor distraction. Then, Avery looked back at the very people who gave her and the other sisters a second chance at life and asked, "So, why did you want us to meet you here, girls?"

From there, you stepped out into the open and answered, "I believe I'm the answer to such a question, Avery." Of course, Avery and her fellow sisters easily recognized you. Or at least, back when you were as the Ghost Rider. "Wait a minute, you're that bonehead with the flaming skull, aren't you?!" Catsy said, easily recognizing you from memory. Of course, you felt a bit insulted by that unapproved nickname, where you then let out a sigh and replied, "Glad to see you still remember me. But yeah, I'm the "bonehead" with the flaming skull. Name's (IYNH)."

However, they were somewhat hesitant to talk to you, so you decided to reassure them and explained, "Look, I know we got off on the wrong foot on that bridge last night, but I'm on the same side as the Sailor Scouts. Otherwise, I wouldn't be in such a talkative mood if I wasn't one of the good guys." ".....Alright, so.... what do you want then?" Birdy asked, wanting to know what your true intentions were, due to you looked like something out of a nightmare when you're in your Ghost Rider form.

In response to her question, you looked at Birdy and her 3 siblings and answered, ".....All I want are some answers, Birdy. I know that you and your sisters have worked with this "Rubeus" character before in the past. I came here to Japan to put an end to whoever or whatever has been causing these disturbances, and I intend to do so. However, I don't know how to stop them if I don't some answers. I'm not trying to interrogate you or anything like that. I just need to know who to go after."

Of course, hearing the name Rubeus obviously put a bad taste in their mouths, as Catsy crossed her arms in frustration and said, "Hmph! Rubeus, that bastard deserves to be dead for all the pain he's caused! And to think I actually loved him." From what you heard from Catsy, you could easily tell that Rubeus sounds like a real scumbag that deserves the wrath of the Ghost Rider's Penance Stare, as you then turned your head toward Raye and asked, "I take it that Rubeus is a real piece of Shit?" "Well, I wouldn't say it like that, (IYNH). But yeah, he was really bad. I mean, he abused Catsy's love for him, but then crushed it when she failed to catch Rini." Raye answered, bringing up how abusive and manipulative Rubeus was toward both Catsy and her fellow siblings.

However, you were a little confused as to who this Rini person was, as you then spoke toward Raye and the other Sailor Scouts and asked, "Wait a sec, who's Rini?" "Ugh, she's a little girl who claims to be from the future like Catsy and the others."Serena replied, with an obvious tone of annoyance in her voice, as if Rini was getting on her nerves in some shape or form. Fortunately for Serena, you decided to focus back on Birdy and her sisters, as you then looked at them and said, "I take it that you ladies were after Rini then, correct?"

"We were. Back when we were working for Rubeus and the NegaMoon." Avery answered, which raised a few more questions than answers for you, as you then spoke once more and asked, "The NegaMoon? I'm guessing that was the faction you and your siblings were a part of prior to your defection?" ".....Yeah, we were a part of that group. Back then, our mission was not just to capture Rini and the Imperium Silver Crystal, we were also trying to corrupt several points around the city in the present with dark energy, so the future city of Crystal Tokyo would cease to exist." Birdy explained, since she was the one who received the details of the NegaMoon's plans by Rubeus himself. From there, you pulled out the map from earlier, as you laid it out on a nearby benched table and said, "When you meant by corrupting several points of the city, did you mean THESE areas?"

Upon looking at the map you've presented, Birdy, Catsy, Avery, and Prisma confirmed your suspicions, as Birdy then spoke to you and answered, "Yes, those were the areas we were trying to take over. Rubeus said it was all part of the NegaMoon's plan to control the Crystal Nexus. Back in the future, it was in the center of the city." Upon confirmation, you then folded up the map for transportation, as you then spoke toward Birdy and her sisters as you said, "So in other words, you, your sisters, and Rubeus traveled back in time to alter the past, so the NegaMoon would succeed in the future and take over Crystal Tokyo."

In confirmation, Birdy nodded once to confirm your summary of the situation at hand, as you then shook her hand and said, "Thanks. That's all I need to know." But then, just as you and the Sailor Scouts were about to leave....
135121221112.title: One of the city's parks

choices: You reached the Arcade Center, attacking the Droid with your Hellfire Chain.
Meanwhile, the other Sailor Scouts continued to trek across the rooftops.
1351212211122.content:
However, it was there that Raye and the other Sailor Scouts began to receive a call from their communicators, as they then responded to the call. From there, they realized that it was both Luna and Artemis whose calling the 5 girls, as Amy spoke toward the two felines and asked, "Luna, Artemis? What's going on?" Suddenly, they heard what sounded like a loud explosion on the other end of the communicator, as Luna spoke up and explained, "Girls, we have a Droid attacking the Arcade Center! It's draining people of their energy! Get over here, quick!"

Of course, you overheard what Luna was talking about, just as Lita then spoke toward Luna and Artemis and replied, "Don't worry, we're on it!" From what you heard, you made an estimated guess that these "Droids" were basically the NegaMoon's foot soldiers, albeit monstrous inhuman foot soldiers. So, as Raye and her friends transformed into the Sailor Scouts, you figured now would be an excellent time to bring out the Ghost Rider.

From there, as you got back on your motorcycle and started up the engine, you looked back at Raye and the other Sailor Scouts and said, "You're not going to get there fast enough, ya know." "You got a better idea, (IYNH)?" Lita asked, a tiny bit annoyed at your comment. From there, you then spoke up and answered, "Look, I can reach that "Droid" much faster than you girls on foot. I can take one of you with me to keep that freak preoccupied until the rest of you arrive. Alright?"

Obviously, the Sailor Scouts decided to go along with your plan, as Raye volunteered to accompany you, where she then sat behind you on the motorcycle. "Alright then....Let's ride!" You exclaimed, as you then quickly transformed back into your Ghost Rider form, causing the motorcycle to violently warp and alter into it's Hell-Cycle form, roaring to life with flaming wheels and a demonic appearance.

From there, you looked back at Sailor Mars and growled, "HOLD ON." Then, you revved on the throttle, causing the Hell-Cycle's engines to roar and howl to life with a demonic aura. In turn, this caused the Hell-Cycle to go from 0 to over 100 miles per hour in two and a half seconds, leaving a trail of Hellfire in the process. Of course, Sailor Mars held on as tight as she possibly could throughout the high-speed ordeal.

You and Lita transformed and the others showed up shortly after. Soon the battle had begun. Aslla Piscu was very powerful and had all of you on the run. He then shot a powerful beam of energy at Jupiter. Just as it was about to hit her, you blocked it by placing yourself in front of the blast. Jupiter yelled "(Name) NO!" You took the entire blast and it nearly knocked you out cold. But then Sailor Moon yelled "ABSOLUTE POWER FORCE!" Then a white flame shot at Aslla Piscu and caused ti of screech in pain. Then you said "Sailor Moon, Red Dragon Archfiend has chosen you because of your devotion to your friends." Then another Crimson Dragon mark was unlocked; the right claw. Then you used all the marks that were unlocked and you yelled "CRIMSON RAGE!" then you charged at Aslla Piscu and sliced and diced him, causing the yellow chaos emerald to appear. You absorbed it and landed on the ground safely. But once again the power was too much and you passed out. Jupiter was extremely concerned that once the last mark is unlocked, the amount of energy would destroy you.
14111111111111111.title: Earthbound Immortal Aslla Piscu

choices: A spider's web. Be born, the perfect hero
141111111111111111.content:
You woke up with bandages all over your body. You could only move your head. When Lita came in she saw you were awake. She went over to you but didn't touch you.
"Stop using the Crimson Dragon's power. Please." Lita begged
"No, I can't." you said "If I do then the Earthbound Immortals will rule."
You and Lita argued but in the end Lita gave up. She stormed out and slammed the door.

That night Lita kept having nightmares of you exploding.

The next morning Lita gave you soup. By then you were fully healed.
141111111111111111.title: Goddamn it

1411111111111111111.content: Just as you finished the soup, another Immortal had appeared. This time it was Earthbound Immortal Uru, the 3rd most powerful Immortal. You were about to transform when your side started to hurt. Lita turned into Sailor Jupiter and the other went to the Immortal. They did very little damage to it. Soon, Sailor Mars had just gained a large amount of energy and shot it at Uru. She was wondering what happened, when she heard you say " The Black Rose Dragon has chosen you Mars." Then Jupiter gasped and said "No please (name). Don't use the power of the Crimson Dragon. It's the final mark." You then turned to her and said "I'm sorry Jupiter. But I have no choice." Just then the head of the dragon was unlocked. Suddenly the entire Crimson Dragon was glowing on your back. Soon the amount of energy had created a lightning storm. The lighning was red in color. Then the lightning struck you and started to surround you. Then the energy started to make you yell in pain. Jupiter started to run towrds you, but then a large explosion came from the spot from where you were standing. However, once the blast had expanded, it started to retreat back to where it came from. When the blast cleared, Jupiter gasped and saw you wearing the Crimson Armor. "I am the Crimson Knight. Defender of Light." you said in a strong and bold voice. Just then Uru struck at you with purple webs. But when it was about to hit you, you raised your arm and an energy barrier formed around you. Then a crimson aura formed around you and you charged at Uru yelling "CRIMSON RUSH!" You then charged through Uru, turning him to dust. When you landed back on the ground, Jupiter ran up to you and slaped you. Then you asked "What did you do that fo-" you were cut off by Jupiters kiss. She then said to you "Don't ever scare me like that again." You told her that you never would again and you embraced each other.
1411111111111111111.title: A Spider's Web. Be Born, the Perfect Hero

14111111111111111111.content:
Your body felt incredible. You could jump higher, lift weights heavier and the taste of green apples was incredible. You could even taste Frogs legs as buttery and sweet instead of chicken.

When you went back to Lita's, Lita grabbed you and threw you onto the bed. Then she brought out some rope and tied you to the bed, facing the bed. She then stripped you down to nothing. After that Lita brought out a riding crop and hit you with it.
"AHHHH!" you yelled "What the hell?"
"This is what you get for not listening to me." Lita said in a dominatrix voice
14111111111111111111.title: The training

141111111111111111112.content: The next dat you and Lita headed for Rei's temple so you could train the scouts how to unleash the power of the dragons. Soon you arrived and you used the Crimson Dragons power to freeze time. You transformed into the crimson Knight and they transformed as well. You then told them to fight you with all their might. They did and the training began. After an hour of training, they were exausted. They still didn't unlock the power of their dragons. Then you took things to the next level and the scouts had a large amount of energy around them. They had unlocked the power of the dragons. They were wearing armor that looked like the dragons themselves. You had completed the training and you unfroze time. You congratulated them and you all went to get something to eat.
141111111111111111112.title: Dragons Unleashed

1411111111111111111121.content:
After lunch you all went back to Rei's to see how long the girls could stay in their dragon forms while fighting. You transformed into the Crimson Knight and the girls managed to transform. You attacked them and they had to protect each other while fighting you. Moon only lasted 30 seconds whereas Jupiter lasted 5 minutes.
"Good," you said "Now try and increase your time."
The girls transformed again and the training continued. Despite their best efforts they could only boost their time to a maximum of 5 minutes 30 seconds before they timed out.
"COME ON!" you yelled "YOU THINK THE NEGAVERSE WILL BE AFRAID OF A MEASLY 5 MINUTES 30 SECONDS?"
The girls got angry and tried again but they timed out at 6 minutes 45 seconds. You kept yelling at the girls but each time they could only increase by 1 minute 15 seconds, until they reached 10 minutes, then they could do nothing but time out at that point. You realised that it would be pointless to continue if 10 minutes was as high as they could push it. Lita was too far exauhsted so you picked her up and carried her home.
1411111111111111111121.title: More training

14111111111111111111211.content: The next day Lita felt much better. But shortly after you woke up, another Immortal appeared. It was Earthbound Immortal Ccarayhua. You and Lita tranformed and the others fallowed you to the fight. The scouts transformed into their dragon nforms and the battle began. It lasted for quite a while but everyone except you transformed back. You knew that they needed to train harder. But as Ccarayhua slamed you into the ground with a swipe of his hand when Jupiter saw this, a huge amount of energy formed around her. Then a small dragon flew down from the sky and combined with Jupiter and she had unlocked a new transformation. A bright flash of light came from where Jupiter was standing and you were shocked at what you saw. "Jupiter, you've unlocked the power of the Majestic Star Dragon." you said. Jupiter then used the veil of energy to charge at Ccarayhua and yelled "COSMIC RUSH!" She bore through Ccarayhua causing the green Chaos emerald to combine with you. When the emerald was inside of you, the Immortal disappeared. Jupiter then passed out while she was still in the air, causing her to fall. You started to fly towards her and caught her just in time. The other scouts asked if she was alright and you told them "Don't worry. She just needs some rest. But there is one thing that is bothering me." "What's that?" asked Venus. "Whenever the Chaos Emeralds combine with me, the Immortals aren't destroyed. They just disappear. Which makes me wonder what is really going on. I wonder if they combine with the most powerful Immortal. Lets just hope that's not the case. you said. Then you took Lita back to her home and you sat by her side until she woke up.

141111111111111111112111.content:
The next day you all showed up at Rei's temple for some more training.
"Okay," you said "Let's begin."
"Wait a minute," said Jupiter "Why should you be leader? I challenge you to a fight for the position of leader."

You and Jupiter got ready. You both attacked each other, first at stage 1. Jupiter was no trouble but when she transformed into her Star Jupiter form you had to transform into Crimson Knight. You were still too strong for Jupiter so she kicked it into her majestic star form. You were being utterly beaten. Jupiter threw a punch but you stopped it but you realised it was a trap. Too late. You got hit in the side of the head, sending you down to the floor. Jupiter smiled and turned around, looking triumphant until you got back up.
"But how?" asked Jupiter
"Don't you know?" you asked "I'm tough enough to take this. JUST WHO THE HELL DO YOU THINK I AM?" Your power grew immense and your body transformed into a new form.
(This guy http://media.animevice.com/uploads/0/4/1...)
You pulled out your sword and swung it, firing a light green energy slash , knocking Jupiter on to her ass.
"This is my ultimate form." you said "This is my god form. The reputation of The Sailor Scouts echoes far and wide... When they talk about its bad ass leader, the man of indomitable spirit and masculinity, they're talking about me! The Mighty (name)!"

The great Condor rose from the ground.
"Shit," you swore "We're all screwed. That's Earthbound Immortal Wiraqocha Rasca."
"We can take him." Lita arrogantly said
You grabbed her and brought her to your face and said
"Run. Rasca is one of the most powerful. If you fight him you will die. I can survive with the Chaos Emeralds but barely."
Lita punched you in the gut and said
"Snap out of it. I'm helping you and that's final."
Lita fully powered up into her Majestic Star form and attack Rasca. The other scouts powered up into their dragon forms, with Moon going into her Majestic Red form, and tthey attacked as well. You transformed into the Crimson Knight and began to take down Rasca. The fight was tough. Rasca easily knocked the scouts out fo their powered up forms. The only ones left were you, Jupiter and Moon. Rasca blasted you with his near death blast, nearly killing you. Jupiter became angry and lost her Majestic form.
"Calm down," you weakly said "Focus on the battle ahead. Become my Shooting Star."
Jupiter focused on defeating Rasca and she created and chibi Jupiter in a formula race car. Both Jupiter's powered up and combined into Shooting Star Jupiter. She attacked Rasca with all her might and nearly destroyed him but Jupiter was knocked out of her form by the near death blast. Moon became pissed and powered up until she created two chibi Moons who pwered up as well and all three Moons became Scar Red Nova Moon. She managed to do more damage to Rasca but it was still not enough. You got back up, bleeding heavily from the fall. You powered up with the help from the chaos emeralds and Rasca's came out and went into you but this time Rasca didn't disappear. You used the power of the chaos emeralds to win. Your right hand was surrounded by fire and you punched Rasca with it. Next you used the Kamahamaha to do more damage. Then it was the Hyde Hand which stopped Rasca's death strike. After that you put your hands together and were blasted at Rasca, plowing straight through him. Then you finished things off by turning your right arm into a massive drill and plowing through Rasca again. Rasca disappeared.

After Rasca disppeared, you passed out due to the massive loss of power. Jupiter then ran up to you and picked you up off the ground. She and the other scouts took you to the hospital as soon as they could.

3 hours later..

You woke up with a bunch of machines hooked up to your bady. You looked around and saw Lita and the others sitting around the bed. They were extremely happy that you were alright, especially Jupiter. They all started to cry tears of joy and you said to them "Girls, I'm fine. I'm just a little sore, that's all." Then the doctor then came inside and said that you would be able to leave in two hours. The girls started to cheer. Two hours later, you and the others left the hospital and went to Lita's for lunch. During lunch, you felt uneasy. Lita asked what was on your mind. You told them that even though Rasca was defeated, it was far from over. It was getting late pretty quickly. The girls left and you and Lita went to bed.

1411111111111111111121111111.content:
When you woke up your body was stiff as a board. I you managed to move a wound would re-open and blood would come out. Lita came in to check on you, her clothes were very skimpy. You saw her clothes, revealing her sexy body and curves. Blood blasted out of your nose and when you tried to cover it up your arms began to bleed as well. You decided that the best idea would be not to move. Lita left the room and came back with some bandages. She put them on your body, with some difficulty, and fed you breakfast. Later that day, when you could move about the house, you challenged Lita to a game of poker. You made a bet: You win and Lita lets you go out for a bit (She wouldn't let you out of the house in your state); Lita wins and you do what she says until you are fully healed (Not sexually)

You had four kings and an ace in your hand.
"Ha," Lita said triumphantly "You can't beat me. Queen's in aces."
Lita wasn't kidding. She did have a full house. 2 Queens and 3 aces. You looked at your hand and placed it face down.
"You win," you lied "I have junk"
Lita told you to go back to bed and you did. Lita said she'd shuffle the deck. She saw your hand and she knew you lied. But she liked having you listen to her so she said nothing.

It was all the Earthbound Immortals, except for Rasca. Then you and Lita transformed and the other did the same. They were in their dragon forms and you were the Crimson Knight. Each one of you fought and defeated an Immortal. You thought that it was way too easy. But when the Immortals were destroyed, they all focused their powers into a human bady. Then Rasca showed up and took over the body created by the Immortals. He was Rasca, the Earthbound Knight. You and the scouts were shocked ath the fact that he was a evil version of you. He then created a sword out of dark energy and made a single stroke. With that stroke, a massive blast of energy blasted you and the scouts into a building. you knew that they didn't stand a chance against him. You knew that it was you vs Rasca.

1412.content:
(You Amy Serena Lita) (You look likse Sasuke from Naruto Shippuden)

Things at school were normal for Lita, Amy and Serena. The same usual classes, with no enemies from the negaverse attacking yet, and everything was peaceful. At around lunch, the two of them were eating lunch together, and Serena still couldn’t resist Lita’s cooking. But as the two of them were walking home, Lita noticed you standing against the wall of a building next to a bench wearing your own outfit. She blushed and stared at you in a dream-like state. Serena noticed this and waved her hand in front of her eyes. “Hello? Earth to Lita.” Lita snapped out of it and said “Uh, yes?” “You know if you want to talk to him, just do it.” “Oh, I don’t know. He probably doesn’t want to talk to me.” “Oh come on Lita.” she said as she grabbed her hand and walked over to you. “Hi there.” Serena said as she walked up to you. “Hey.” you said in a cool and collected tone, which Lita just thought was awesome. “Mind if we join you?” “Go ahead.” Lita sat down next to you and Serena and Amy took a seat as well. “So, what school do you go to?” “From the look of it, I go to the same school as you.” “Really? We’ve never seen you around before.” “I start tomorrow.” “Well, let us welcome you to our school. I’m Serena.” “My name’s Amy.” “And my name’s Lita.” she said with a blush. “Nice to meet you. My name is Sasuke Uchiha.” “So, do you live around here?” You were about to answer that when the four of you heard the sound of screaming. You then went charging towards the source of the commotion was coming from. “Where are you going?” “I have a job to do.” As you went charging towards whatever is causing the screaming, Amy, Lita and Serena contacted Mina and Rei and transformed into the Sailor Scouts. Once they did that, the three of them followed you.
1412.title: Chaos and Jupiter

14121.content:
(Your sword is exactly like Sasuke's)

As Lita, Amy and Serena were running towards the location of the explosion, they saw that you were only a few feet ahead of them. But then they noticed that you stopped and they saw why. There was an absolutely massive demon with a large number of tendrils and just as the others arrived, they thought this was going to be a tough one. Jupiter then noticed you were walking towards the demon. “Hey wait!” “Just stand back and watch Sailor Scouts. I will handle this.” “What can you do?” “Just watch Serena.” The girls were shocked that you knew Serena’s identity, and Amy and Lita had a feeling you knew who they were too. “Let’s just make this quick.” You said as you drew your sword. The demon sent a large number of his tendrils at you. The girls were concerned for your safety until they saw you dodge and slice each of the tendrils with ease. They were extremely surprised by your skill, especially Lita, being a bit of a fighter herself. You then ran towards the demon and it sent more tendrils at you. You began to run up one of them and sliced the others. The demon tried to hot you with its claws, but you sliced it hand just as easily as its tendrils. Once you made it to its shoulder, you jumped high above it and called upon the power of lightning. When the girls saw this, they were both shocked and amazed. You then came down and sliced the demon down the middle, but it looked like nothing happened. You then put your sword in the sheath and when that happened, the demon was split in two and was destroyed in an instant.
14121.title: A Warrior Revealed

141211.content:
(Rei Rini Mina)

Once the demon was destroyed, the girls walked up to you and you could tell they wanted answers. “If you want answers, we need a place we can talk.” “We should go to my temple.” “Agreed.” The girls then transformed and the other three introduced themselves along the way. “My name's Mina.” “I’m Rei.” “The names Rini.” “Nice to meet you, I’m Sasuke Uchiha.” Once you all got to the temple, you explained to the girls that you were the last of your clan and how a demon named Blackheart was loose in the world following the orders of the Ten Terrors and the Master, who were sealed away by your mother, father and brother. “So you’ve been alone for how long?” “Ten years.” “I’m sorry to hear that.” “Don’t be.” “Well, where did you sleep?” “I usually slept on a tree branch up against the tree. And whenever I entered the cities, I just slept on the rooftops.” “That’s terrible.” “It’s the life I was forced to live because of the attack on my clan. I swore I would destroy the Master and restore my clan, no mater what.” The girls felt very sorry for you. “Sasuke?” “Yes Lita?” “If you’d like, you can stay with me for a while.” she said with a blush on her face. “Alright. I accept your offer.” All of the girls were surprised by this. But it was getting late so they had to let it slide. You and Lita went to her home that night.
141211.title: A New Friend and Ally

1412111.content: After a short little walk, you and Lita reached her home. “Come on in Sasuke.” she said opening the door. “Ladies first.” Lita blushed a little and went inside first. You followed her and once you got inside, you thought it was a pretty nice place. Once you were finished looking, you followed Lita to the guest room. When you got there, you went inside to take a look around. “It’s not much, but it’s your own room at least.” “It’s fine. I thank you Lita for letting me stay here.” “It’s no trouble. By the way, don’t you have a uniform?” “No. I wouldn’t wear it even if I had it.” Lita looked at you and thought “This guy is such a bomb.” You noticed Lita staring at you and you asked what was up. “Oh, nothing. It’s just you remind me of my ex-boyfriend.” You rolled your eyes without Lita noticing. She then left the room and you went to sleep some time after that.
1412111.title: Lita's Home

14121111.content: The next day, Lita woke up and went to check up on you. She found that you were not in the room. She looked around and found you outside training with your martial arts. She was amazed at your skills, but she remembered that you both had school. She went inside, got dressed and made lunch for both of you. Once she did that, the two of you walked to school together and you met up with Amy, who was also on time. “Good morning you two.” “Morning Amy.” “Morning.” “How do you like staying with Lita, Sasuke?” “It’s nice. It’s a lot better than the places I’ve slept in for the past ten years.” “That’s good to hear.” Soon, you and the others reached the school and Serena was late, as usual. You were asked by the teacher to introduce yourself and you did. Apparently no one had a problem with you not wearing the uniform. Classes went by just fine and soon it was lunch time.
14121111.title: The Next Day

141211111.content: As soon as class was done, you decided to head for the roof for lunch. It didn’t take long for Lita to join you, as well as Serena and Amy. “Hey Sasuke.” “Girls.” “Mind if we join you?” “Not at all.” The girls sat down, with Lita right next to you. You opened up your lunch and saw the food Lita had prepared for you. Without you knowing, Lita looked over at you hoping that you would like her cooking. You took one of the food items and took a bite. Your eyes widened with the explosion of flavor within it. “Do you like it?” she asked with a slight hint of worry. You closed your eyes again and continued to eat. “Lita, I will be completely honest with you. This is the best cooking I’ve had in ages.” Lita blushed a little when you said that. “Sasuke you should know, when it comes to cooking, Lita is the best around.” “Oh come on Serena.” “Don’t be so modest Lita.” “You really should give yourself some credit. It doesn’t take a psychic to know you have a bright future in the culinary world Lita.” “Th-Thank you Sasuke.” she said with the blush on her face getting brighter. Once lunch was finished, you all went back to class which went smoothly for the rest of the day.
141211111.title: During Lunch

142.content:
(I'm just going to put you in the sailor moon world at the start)

Then sailor scouts were in trouble. The creature was about to take out Sailor Jupiter. You came from behind and yelled "Solar laser!" A beam of light shot from your first two fingers and sliced the side of the creature. Who are you?" the creature asked in a demonic voice. "I am the warrior of the sun. I am Solaris Knight! And in the name of Ra, I shall crush you. Now, if you harm Sailor Jupiter one more time you will pay." you said in and angry voice. Then the creature pushed you over the edge. "You mean like this?!" the creature said while kicking Sailor Jupiter. Then you started to have a large veil of energy around you. Then you yelled "THIS HAND OF MINE SHINES AND ROARS!
