One day, the scouts were in a lot of trouble. A monster with a large amount of strength appeared and they could not defeat it. Tuxedo Mask joined in the fight, but he was no match for the beast. It turns out the monster was a minion of the demon, Blackheart. He was about to finish Venus off first, when from out of nowhere, a small blast of lightning struck him and forced him to let go of her. “Thanks Jupiter.” “Don’t look at me. I didn’t do it.” “Well then who did?” “That, would be me.” a voice said. The girls turned and saw a man wearing a mask of his own. He was also wearing a black jacket with an extended length near the bottom. “Who are you?” “Until this battle is over, you can call me Chaos.” “Were you the one who saved me?” “Yes, now all of you just leave this to me.” you said as you slowly walked towards the creature. “You attack these girls in the name of your master. You will be defeated.” The girls were amazed at how cool and collected you were as you approached the monster they could hardly scratch. Mina, Lita and Rei were falling for you, hard. “So, I will give you a sporting chance. I will fight in hand-to-hand combat for a while.” The creature smiled evilly and made a single swipe of his claws, but you easily ducked under it and charged forward with a barrage of fists. The girls were in awe of your speed and power and so was Tuxedo Mask. You were defeating this creature with ease. But the creature decided to take one last shot at you. He made one more swipe with his claws and ended up destroying your mask. You then landed a powerful kick and sent him back a ways. “I think it’s time to end this.” you said creating a blade of lightning in your hand. You then charged at the beast and when you thrusted the blade forward, you yelled “Chidori!” You pierced his chest and destroyed it instantly.
1523.title: Chaos and Venus

15231.content:
(T.M. Amy Serena)

Once the creature was destroyed, the girls ran up to you to check up on you. “Are you alright?” “Yeah, he just sliced my mask, that’s all.” “Well, thank you for saving us.” “It was no problem. Allow me to introduce myself.” you said as you turned around. “My name is Sasuke Uchiha. It’s a pleasure to meet you.” When the girls saw your face, their eyes almost literally turned into hearts. “So, mind if I ask who you are?” “We better head to my temple before we introduce ourselves.” “Good idea, we do not know who’s watching.” You and the girls went to the temple in the city and so did Tuxedo Mask. “So, you all know my name, who are you?” “My name’s Serena.” “I’m Darien.” “My name’s Rei.” “I’m Amy. Pleased to meet you.” “The name’s Lita.” “My name’s Mina.” she said with a slight blush. “Pleased to meet you all.” “So, how do you control lightning?” “It’s not just lightning. I can control earth, fire, wind, water, darkness, and ice as well as lightning.” “Wow, that’s amazing.” “I was born with the power of Chaos, which is why I can control these elements.” “Chaos?” You then called upon the chaos emeralds, which surrounded you in a circle. “These are the seven Chaos Emeralds. Each one represents a different element. They are a part of my body.” you said as they disappeared. “In the wrong hands, they could be used to destroy the entire planet. But I use their power for good.” “Wow.” she said in a dreamlike state. Mina really fell for you here. “So, do you live near-by?” “Truth be told, I have no home. I lost everything years ago. But I do not want to talk about it.” “Well, you can stay here at the temple.” “No. Please, stay with me. It’s the least I can do. You did save my life after all.” The other girls thought that was fair and decided to let Mina have this one. “Very well. I accept your offer. Well, shall we?” You and Mina went outside and you gave a whistle. From out of nowhere, a motorcycle drove up to you and Mina on its own You then created a second helmet and gave it to Mina. “Hop on.” Mina got behind you and held on to you. “Hang on tight.” Mina happily obliged. You then started up the bike and rode off to Mina’s. She gave you directions as you drove.
15231.title: A New Friend

152311.content:
(Artemis)

You arrive at Mina’s and Mina shows you inside. You noticed a white cat with a crescent moon on its forehead. “Oh, this is my cat Artemis. Artemis, say hello.” “Nice to meet you.” “Likewise. Hey Mina, do you have a shower?” Mina blushed and showed you to the bathroom. There you found a nice sized shower. “Thanks Mina.” Mina left and you got into the shower. Mina really wanted to peek, but she knew you might get a little mad if she did that. A few minutes later, you got out of the shower with only your pants and a towel around your neck. “Thanks for letting me use your shower.” Mina looked and saw your body and once again, her eyes almost literally turned into hearts. “What a hunk!” she thought to herself. “It was no problem. I guess I should show you the guest room huh?” “Probably. I will grab my jacket from the bathroom.” you said as you walked upstairs. As you turned away, Mina noticed a huge scar on your back. It was so big it covered almost your entire back. But she decided not to ask how you got that just yet. She showed you the guest room and you hung up your jacket. As Mina left the room and let you settle in, she could not help but wonder where you got that scar, or what could have given it to you. She then noticed that it was getting late, and told you that she hopes you enjoy your stay at her home. “Thank you.” Mina knew that you would stop keeping yourself so distant in time, so she left and went to bed. For a while, you stared at the moon on the bed. “It’s funny. I haven’t slept in an actual bed for years. I’ve just been sleeping up against trees and on rooftops. But as much as I want to relax, I cannot. Not until my clan has been avenged. Only then, can I move on with my life.” You said to yourself. And shortly after that, you fell asleep.
152311.title: Mina's Home

1523111.content: The next morning, Mina went to check on you and found that you were still asleep. “I wonder how long it’s been since he slept in a bed.” she said to herself. She decided to let you sleep a little longer. About 30 minutes later, you woke up and the morning was quite peaceful. You and Mina had a little breakfast and a nice little chat. Things were extremely peaceful with Mina around, but you didn’t notice at the time. Though, at about noon, there was trouble in the city. Mina transformed and you got your clothes on and you rushed off to the battle.
1523111.title: The Next Morning

15231111.content:
(The chaos beam cannon is the exact same thing as the special beam cannon)

You and Mina met up with the others and found another of Blackheart’s creatures in the middle of the city. This one was much larger thought. You used your powers to create a barrier of energy around all of the buildings. “Come on, let’s do this.” you said as you charged towards it. But the creature had a tail as well, so you ended up getting sent into a car, leaving a massive dent in it. “Sasuke! Are you alright?” “Yeah, it’s nothing.” You then knew you had to distract the creature so the others could attack. You then called upon the power of water and shot a blast of water at the creature, which got it’s attention. It then threw a fireball at you, which you dodged easily. But the car was destroyed instantly. “I hope this guy has good insurance." You said to yourself. But then the creature kept throwing fireballs at you. You ended up running along the sides of buildings to avoid them. “Girls, this is your chance. Attack him now while I charge my energy.” “Right.” Venus and the others began their assault, which did do some damage to the creature, but not much. You then placed your first two fingers at your forehead and began to charge your energy. “Girls, get out of the way now!” The scouts got out of the way and you yelled as you pointed your two fingers at him. “Chaos Beam Cannon!” The beam shot towards the monster and went completely through him. Once the creature was destroyed, you took down the barrier and walked towards the girls. “Sasuke, your so cool.” she thought to herself. “So, who’s hungry?” The girls were hungry and you told them it would be your treat. “You might regret that offer Sasuke. Serena might clean you out.” “Can it Rei.” They two of them went at it and you broke them up. You and the girls then went out to eat.
15231111.title: Battle in the City

152311111.content: As soon as you and the girls entered the cafÃ©, you all ordered your meals and waited for them. While you were waiting, you went to the bathroom for a moment to splash some cold water on your face. As you were doing this, Mina wanted to talk to the girls about that scar on your back. “Girls, listen. Sasuke has a huge scar on his back. I mean it almost covers his entire back.” “Really? What do you think did that?” “I don’t know.” “Have you asked him?” “I don’t think he wants to talk about it. So I didn’t ask him.” “Mina, I can tell you really want to help him, so it might be a good idea to ask about that scar.” “I suppose you’re right.” And in that moment, you returned. “Say Sasuke, you mind if I ask you something?” “You want to know about the scar on my back, right?” “Yes.” “I will tell you all after lunch. I promise.” And with that, your meals arrived and you all started to dig in, especially Serena. After you were finished, you paid the bill and you all went ot the temple.
152311111.title: During Lunch

1523111111.content: When you all arrived at the temple, you went into Rei’s room and you shut the door. You then took off your jacket and your shirt, revealing the very large scar. “What on earth could have given you a scar that large and deep?” “Blackheart.” “Blackheart?” “He is the one who has been sending these creatures here. Not to mention…” “Sasuke?” “Blackheart, slaughtered my entire clan before my very eyes.” The girls gasped in shock. “It’s been ten years since that day, and I have been hunting Blackheart ever since.” “And the scar?” “I found him about a year ago, and I fought him. He was not in his true form, but he managed to get behind me and send a powerful energy blast my way. Then he left after he told me his plan was to strike here.” “But how are you still alive?” “I guess I have my powers to thank for that. I can heal myself very quickly. If it weren’t for that, I wouldn’t be here right now.” “But why here? Why now?” “I don’t know. But I promise you this, I will protect you all from Blackheart. He will not touch my friends.” The girls smiled and said that they would help you. “Thank you. For now, I say we relax.” “Agreed.” You and Mina went back home, while the others went their separate ways for now.
1523111111.title: The Scar's Story

15231111111.content: Once you and Mina got home, the two of you sat down on the couch and relaxed for a bit. You both were pretty relaxed for a while, although Mina was a little sore, even though you were the one who got slammed into a car. “Something wrong Mina?” “Oh, I’m just a little sore. Nothing to worry about.” You chuckled a little. “Oh, sorry. I shouldn’t be complaining about being sore after you were thrown into a car.” “It’s fine Mina. I’m used to it, so I’m fine.” “Oh, good. I didn’t want to seem rude or anything.” “Mina, relax. You don’t have to be so nervous around me.” Mina took a deep breath and exhaled. “Sorry Sasuke. I guess I was just nervous because I’ve never been alone with someone like you before.” “It’s fine.” you said with a chuckle. “So do you mind if I ask you something?” “Sure.” “Would you mind…” she said with a blush as she kind of trailed off for a minute “Please rub my back?” You began to blush at this point as well, even though that has never happened before. “What is this, increased heartbeat?” you thought to yourself. “Sure.” Mina got up off the couch and grabbed your hand. She then began to pull you up to her bedroom. She then lied down on her bed and said in a flirtatious manner “I’m ready.” “What is this feeling?” you thought. You then walked over to Mina and slowly began to rub her back. She sighed in pleasure. “You really know what you’re doing.” “Thanks. It’s the least I can do for letting me stay here.” You continued to rub and massage her back for a while and even did some work on her shoulders. “Wow, you really were tense.” “Yeah, fighting evil is stressful work.” “Tell me about it.” you finished your massage and Mina thanked you. “Yeah, well it’s getting late. I guess I better…” you were cut off when you felt Mina’s hand grab your wrist. “Mina?” “Sasuke, if it’s alright with you…” she says with a deep blush “would you mind sleeping in here tonight? You know, as a friend?” You could see through her charade easily. “Mina…I never realized how beautiful she is.” you thought to yourself. “Alright Mina. I will sleep in here, as a friend.” Mina smiled and asked you to leave the room so she could change. You did as she asked and in a few minutes, she called you back and you walked in. You told her you would change as well before you came in with her. So you just put on some shorts and entered the room. Mina had a spot in the bed open next to her and you got right in. “Good night Mina.” “Good night Sasuke.” “Good night Artemis.” “Good night you two.” Mina and Artemis fell asleep shortly after that, but you were still awake. “What is this feeling? I have never felt this way before in my life. I feel as thought I have nothing to worry about when I’m with Mina. Perhaps, I’m in love with her.” you thought to yourself. “Sasuke, don’t leave me.” she said in her sleep. You could tell she was deeply in love with you. “I will not leave you Mina.” you said to yourself. You kissed her on the forehead and fell asleep shortly after that.
15231111111.title: Later

152311111111.content: The next morning, you and Mina woke up at about the same time. “Morning Sasuke.” “Morning.” You and Mina had some breakfast and you two got dressed for the day, you wore your usual outfit and Mina wore one of her many casual outfits. “Sasuke, doesn’t that outfit ever get dirty?” “Not really. This outfit is made completely out of my own energy. So it never gets dirty or worn out, at least not outside a battle.” “Wow, you are just full of surprises.” “Thanks.” You then noticed Artemis waking up as well. “Morning Artemis.” “Good morning. Say, aren’t you supposed to meet the others at the temple today?” “Oh man I completely forgot.” “Relax you two. We can take my ride.” Mina nodded and the two of you got on your bike. “Hang on Mina.” She did this with great pleasure, once again. The two of you rode off to the temple.
152311111111.title: The Next Morning

1523111111111.content:
(Your look http://www.writing.com/main/interact/ite...)

Soon, you and Mina arrived at the temple. “Sorry we’re a little late.” “It’s fine." “So, why did we have to meet?” “Well, an old friend of Darien’s has invited us to a little formal event and we would like to ask if you would come along.” “Oh, why not? I haven’t been to any kind of party in years.” “Really?” “Yeah. As I said, ever since the destruction of my clan, there really hasn’t been a reason for me to party. I haven’t even had a birthday party in ages.” “What? Well we are going to fix that. When is your birthday?” “The 13th of October.” “Well we are going to give you a party, whether you like it or not.” “Serena!” “It’s okay Rei. I appreciate the offer. But for now, I say we focus on this party. I am going to need to do a little outfit change here.” “What?” “Sasuke here can make his own outfits out of his own energy.” “What? No way!” You then decided to show them. You changed your outfit from your usual battle style (see the link above for details of normal clothing.) to a white tux. “Well?” “That is a cool ability, but white doesn’t suit you.” “True.” You then changed it from white to black. “Much better.” “Well, I say we have fun tonight.” “I second that.” You changed your outfit back and you and the girls decided to chat until it was time to get ready for the party.
1523111111111.title: At The Temple

15231111111111.content:
(Amara Michelle)

A few hours later, it time for the party. You were ready, all you needed to do is wait for Mina. Luckily, you didn’t have to wait long. When she came downstairs, she was wearing the most beautiful dress. “Well, what do you think?” You could only stare with a slight blush. “Sasuke?” You snapped out of it and answered her. “Mina, you look… so beautiful.” She smiled and blushed and said “Well, come on. We don’t want to be late.” You held out your arm like a gentleman. She held your arm and the two of you walked to your bike. You then drove off to the Rose Mansion. When you arrived, you met up with the others and you all went inside. There you met a couple friends of the girls, Amara and Michelle. “Hey guys.” “Amara, Michelle, let me introduce the newest member of our team; Sasuke Uchiha.” “Nice to meet you.” They both extended their hands. “The pleasure’s mine. So I assume you’re Sailor Scouts too?” “Yep, we’ll introduce ourselves later on. But for now, I say we have some fun.” “Oh they're playing a Waltz. Darien, would you please honor me with a dance?” “No he’s going to dance with me.” “Come on, why don’t I give you a lesson and you can have him all to yourself?” “Oh, well I do need a lesson.” Amara took Serena to the dance floor, and Darien with Michelle. And to the disbelief of you and the girls, Serena was actually Waltzing. They then began to fight over who would get the next lesson by playing rock paper scissors. But you placed your hand on Mina’s shoulder and said “You don’t need to wait for Amara to get a lesson. I’ll teach you.” “Sasuke…” “Come on.” Mina dropped out of the game, leaving Rei, Lita and Amy to fight for the next lesson. You and Mina made your way to the dance floor and you began to waltz. “That’s it Mina. You’re doing great.” Mina just stared in your eyes with a dream-like expression on her face. “I’m so lucky. Having such a gorgeous guy dancing with me like this.” The two of you continued to dance as thoughts like this continued to go through her head. “But I need to know how he feels.” she thought. “Sasuke?” “Yes Mina?” “Have you ever fallen in love before?” You knew what she was getting at instantly, but you decided to answer her question truthfully. “Truth be told. I haven’t. At least not until recently.” “Recently?” “Yes. I think I am in love with…” but before you could answer, another creature that belonged to Blackheart burst through the wall and caused a lot of commotion. As the crowd ran, the creature walked towards you and Mina. “Mina, stay behind me.” “Sasuke…” As you defended Mina, the others transformed and blasted the monster away from the two of you. “Are you alright?” “Yeah, thanks Lita. Now Mina, I say we join the fight.” “Right. Venus Crystal Power!” Mina said as she transformed. You then changed your outfit back to the normal style and you got ready to fight.
15231111111111.title: At The Party

152311111111111.content: As soon as you and Mina got ready, the creature charged at the two of you. The two of you separated and it went after Mina. She kept dodging the attacks, but she couldn’t dodge forever. “Leave her alone!” you said as you charged towards the creature. You focused your energy into your fist and took a shot at the creature, but it blocked the attack by grabbing your wrist. He then pulled your arm to the side so he could create an opening. He then placed his other hand in front of your chest. He then shot an energy blast at you, sending you flying through the wall and into another room. “Sasuke!” The creature returned its attention to Mina and proceeded to kill her. “Uranus World Shaking!” “Neptune Deep Submerge!” They said as they attacked from the sides. Their attacks did hurt the creature, but they didn’t stop it. The creature then shot something form its eyes at the others and paralyzed them. “Venus, run!” But before she could do that, the creature extended its arm and grabbed her by the neck. But in that moment, the arm was sliced off from a distance. As the creature howled in pain, Mina looked and saw you standing, even though you had a large hole in your shirt. “You will not harm on hair on her head.” you said as you called upon the power of wind. You created a sphere of wind in your hand and Mina could tell how powerful it was just from how fast it was spinning. You then charged at the creature and landed a powerful kick, which sent him through a glass window door and onto a balcony. “Now that we’re outside, you will pay for attacking Mina.” You once again began to charge and this time, you thrusted your right arm forward and the wind sphere connected with the creatures stomach. The sphere began to bore into him. “RASENGAN!” you yelled as you sent him into the sky. The amount of power in that attack destroyed him when he was high enough. You then used your powers to repair all of the damages the creature did and the people returned to find everything back in place. Luckily, you and the girls were back to normal at that point. “Now that that’s over, what were you going to say?” “Well…” you said scratching the back of your head and blushing “I was saying I think I’m in love… with you Mina.” Mina blushed and she hugged you at that point and you embraced her as well. “I love you too Sasuke.” The girls saw what was happening and decided to keep quiet for now. Shortly after that, you and Mina ad one last slow dance and shortly after that, the two of you went home.
152311111111111.title: Party Brawl

1523111111111111.content: Later that night, you and Mina returned home and you decided to take a shower. The hot water felt good on your stressed muscles. You felt extremely relaxed. You got out of the showed and Mina went in. As she took a shower, you and Artemis waited for her in her room. You scratched behind his ear and he began to purr. In a few minutes, Mina returned and saw how well you and Artemis were getting along. You and Mina crawled into bed and Artemis right above your heads. Before she went to sleep, Mina kissed your cheek.
1523111111111111.title: Later

15231111111111111.content: The next day, you decided to go for a little ride in order to clear your head. As you rode, you continued to think about how Mina would be in danger so long as you were around. “I am a constant danger to the woman I love, and her friends. But I made an oath, I swore I would protect her and to be with her.” you said as you turned around and went back to Mina’s. But when you got back, you noticed a note on the door. “Sasuke, come to Rei’s Temple. It’s urgent. Mina.” You drove off as fast as you could, without going over the speed limit of course. You got to the temple and walked up the steps. Everything seemed peaceful enough, and you could sense no danger. “Odd, I wonder why Mina said this was urgent.” You opened the door to the temple and noticed that the girls shoes were there, and yet the place was totally silent. “Okay, what’s going on?” you said as you made your way to Rei’s room and opened the door.
15231111111111111.title: The Next Morning

152311111111111111.content:
(All)

As soon as you entered the room, the lights turned on and confetti poppers started going off. “Surprise! Happy Birthday Sasuke!” You were actually pretty surprised by what was going on. This was the first party you’ve had in over ten years. “Jeez, I guess I forgot that it was my own birthday.” “Well, we wanted to do something nice for you." "You are a great friend and teammate.” “Yeah, welcome to the Sailor Scouts.” “Though you will be in the same department as me.” You chuckled a little and said “I get the idea. So, what do you all say we have some fun?” Everyone agreed with you on that and the party began. Music was playing, Lita brought her amazing cooking, Mina even did a little singing. You did get a few gifts that suited your style, such as a few shuriken, courtesy of Rei. A book on ancient warriors from Amy. A set of kunai knives from Lita. A sword from Serena and Darien. And from Mina, she said she would give you her present later on. “Thank you. All of you, I can honestly say this was the best birthday I’ve had.” “We’re happy to help Sasuke.” “I wish I had met you guys a long time ago.” “I wish that myself Sasuke.” “Thanks Mina.” You and the others had a great party. But when it was time to leave, you and Mina got on your bike and went back home.
152311111111111111.title: A Great Party

1523111111111111111.content:
(Your new outfit is that of Sasuke in Naruto Shippuden)

As soon as you and Mina got back home, the two of you sat down on the couch and Artemis joined you. You gently stroked his chin and he began to purr. “Sasuke, I can honestly say that I have never been as happy as I am with you.” “And the same goes for me Mina. You alone have calmed the storm in my heart.” “Sasuke…” Mina smiled and said “Now here’s one of my gifts to you.” she said as she leaned in and kissed you on the lips. You blushed a little and you returned the kiss. Mina then broke the kiss and handed you a bag with some new clothes in it. You had to admit, this new outfit was your style and you decided to make it your permanent outfit. “Mina, thank you.” “I love you Sasuke.” “I love you too Mina.” the two of you kissed each other and then you both went off to bed.
1523111111111111111.title: Mina's Kiss & a New Look

153.content:
(You Mina)

One day, Mina was alone when she was awwacked by some fool named Jack Spicer. He knew that she was Sailor Venus so he ordered his Jack Bots to destroy her. She transformed and began to fight off the robots alone. One of them caught her by surprise and she began to fall into a lake. But before she fell into the water, someone caught her. She opened her eyes and saw you. "Chase Young. Pleased to meet you." Mina looked at you with amazment and noticed that you were hovering above the water. You then began to fly up to the edge of the cliff. You set her down and looked at Spicer. Just then, you destroyed the rest of the robots with very little trouble. Jack knew he had to make a retreat and he did just that. Mina transformed back to normal and she saw you walk away. "Wait!" You turned around and Mina asked where you lived. You then pointed at the mountain that was very menacing in appearance. You then started to walk home and Mina went to thell the others about you. What she didn't know is that you were watching her. "Just as I planned."
153.title: Dragon

1531.content:
(Rei Jack Wuya )

Back at Rei's temple, Mina told the others about what happend. "Mina, you need to stay away from him. Chase Young is evil." "Rei how can he be evil if he saved my life?" Rei just sat there silently. Mina then left the temple to find you. Along the way, Mina had to cross a dersert like are of the city. She had no idea of what was hiding beneath the sand dunes. Along the way, she saw you with a couple of tigers at your side. "Chase!" You turned and so did you jungle cats. You told them not to attack. But as Mina walked right up to you, the other sailor scouts arrived on the scene and prepared for battle. "So, these are the sailor scouts." Just then, you whistled and a large number of tigers appeared from out of nowhere. The others charged at you but you used your martial arts skills to defend, not attack. But then, Jack Spicer appeared out of the sand riding the cyclops which was holding your leg. "Is this the best you can do Jack?" You then threw the Wushan Guiser into the air and kicked it into the cyclopse's eye. He and Jack both feel into the sand. "The Idea is adiquate, but the execution is lacking. As are you." "Oh yeah? Well I got something you don't." "Very small hands?" "No. The sphere of Yun." Just then, you were trapped inside a cage and Jack began to gloat. "Now that I have you captured, the jungle cats are not in my control." He then snapped his fingers and the cats attacked the scouts. But he was far from finished, so he called them off and got back on cyclops. "Don't bite off more than you can chew Spicer. It may come back to bite you." Just then, Jack, cyclops, and the jungle cats started to head for your home. The scouts knew that Jack Spicer was more idiot than evil. But Mina was in love with you but didn't tell the others.

~back at your home~

"I got to hand it to you. This is one fine crib. And now it's my crib." "You should count your good fortune, while it lasts." Jack then began to gloat again. You yawned and said "Could you keep it down? I think I'll get some sleep." Wuya then appeared "Where's your evil genius now? Asleep in a cage like a parrot." "Oh, Jack, you know you were always my favorite." Jack then went to fight the sailor scouts.
1531.title: Switch to Mina

choices: "I have no interest in you anymore."
"Chase, please get them out of here."
15311.content:
Back with the scouts, The others were surprised that Spicer surprised you. But then he showed up and took whatever shen gong wu he could get. But he was stopped before he could take most of it. As Rei and the others were going to get some rest, Mina decided to help you. She grabbed the golden tiger claws and the reversing mirror. She then used the tiger claws to go to your home.

~your palace~

You were meditateing in your prison when Mina appeared. "I didn't realise it was visiting hours." "I.. did not come for a visit." "So why are you here?" "To rescue you. Reversing mirror!" Just then the prison was destoyed and you walked over to Mina. "So have you reconsidered my offer to join me?" "No I owed you. Now I have repaid it." "You may be closer to joining me than you think with that little white lie." "I do not lie." "Really? You mean you didn''t free me for your own self-interest? To stop that nitwit Jack Spicer?" "Well maybe a little." "Isn't that what evil is all about? A lie here, a little bad there. Suddenly it's so easy." You told her to stay behind the pillar and wait for you to say her name. Just then, Jack returned and walked over to you. "How's it going Mr. I used to be somebody evil?" "It goes well. And you?" "Better than you could say, you old relic." But then he said "Hey, how did you get over here when I left you over there? Please don't hurt me! I'm frail, and I bruise easily." "I was always with you Chase. At least in spirit." You then walked over to Jack. "There is one thing I want to know." "Yes, anything." "Who would you rather be right now? You...." you then transformed "Or me?" "You?" "Care to watch Mina?" Mina then decided to watch while leaning against the pillar. You then smiled and sent Jack Spicer to the next world and you did the same with the cyclops. Just then the others arrived and saw what happened. They asked why Mina was here and she said.....
15311.title: The Scouts

153112.content: "You transformed back and snapped your fingers. The jungle cats appeared and surrrounded the other scouts. "Mina, what are you doing?" "Mina looks at Mars and gives a dark and serious look. "If you need me, you can find me and Artemis on the Heylin side." Just then Artemis came from behind a pillar and you snapped your fingers again. But this time, Artemis transformed into a white tiger and gave a mighty roar. The girls only had one option get out of there. So they did just that And you walked over to Mina. "Now that you have joined me, I will rule the world with you at my side. At last the prophacy has been realised." Dark clouds formed outside and the world was turned into a molten wasteland. You then offered Mina a feast to welcome her to the Heylin side. She accepts and you ordered your cats to prepare the feast. You created a throne for Mina to sit next to you. She took a seat at her throne and Artemis sat next to her. You knew you could not be stopped now.
153112.title: Dark Venus

1531121.content: Soon, one of your tigers came to you and told you that everything was ready. You and Mina went to the dining hall and you both sat down. As you began to eat, Mina asked if she could transform like you. You smiled and snapped your fingers. One of your tigers then brought her a bowl of soup. Mina asked what it was. "It is Lou Meng Lon soup, the ancient potion of the dragon. If you drink it, not only will you have a transformation like mine, but you also be forever young like me. You will aslo be just as evil as I am. I will give you some time to think it over. In the mean time, I will have a bowl myself." Your tiger brought a second bowl to you. But before you drank it, Mina stopped you. You looked at her and wondered why she told you to stop. She then raised her bowl into the air and you did the same. When she drank hers, Mina then transformed into a dark gold version of yourself (Gold replaces the green). She gave a mighty roar and she transformed back. You took her to the spa chamber and she transformed again. This time she went over to a giant heated rock area and lied there. You transformed as well and curled up next to her in your dragon form. Soon, you and Mina would have to take the other scouts out.
1531121.title: Ture Evil

15311211.content: Back at Rei's temple, the others were very surprised that Mina joined you. But soon their attention was taken to you when the radio said "Attention; all citizens are advised to saty home. Chase Young is attacking the city. There appears to be a young girl with him." Rei and the others transformed and rushed off to find you. They didnt have to look very long. They found you alone and surrounded you. "Where's Mina?" You then pointed to your left and the girls saw Mina. She then transformed and surprised the girls. Mina jumped in front of them and waited for your permision. "Have at it Mina. You've earned it." Mina smiled and rushed the girls. She defeated them even though the other girls had shen gong wu in their possesion. "See Mina. Like I taught you, shen gong wu are a crutch for true power." Just then, you and Mina went back to your home while in your dragon forms. You turned to the girls. "As you can see, Mina belongs with me. Now and forever. But if you really want to have her back, you must defeat the both of us." "Come to our home if you wish to fight." You and Mina then went back to your home. The girls knew that they needed to finish this once and for all.
15311211.title: Mina vs The Scouts

1532.content:
(You/Chase Young Mina Artemis)

One day, Mina was just finishing class, when she noticed a lot of the other student couples and she wished that she could find someone that she could go out with. But she was still happy that she had her friends and Artemis. Along the way to the temple, she was suddenly ambushed by another creature from the negaverse. She was about to transform into Sailor Venus when the creature used some kind of tendril to knock the item out of her hand. She was extremely vulnerable at this point. But before the creature could attack, A couple of tigers sprang out of nowhere and attacked the creature. “What? Where did those come from?” “I don’t know Artemis, but I’m glad they did.” The two tigers jumped back and got in front of Mina. “Someone seems to command these tigers, but who?” “That would be me.” Mina turned around and saw you. You walked up to the demon and it attacked with its tendrils. You managed to block all of them with your martial arts skills and Mina was extremely impressed. The creature was about to attack when you got in front of it and landed a powerful blow to the chest, sending a beam of energy through its heart. Once the demon was destroyed, the tigers walked towards you and you turned towards Mina. She thought that she hit the jackpot. “Sailor Venus I presume.” “H-How did you know who I am?” “For one…” you said as you snapped your fingers and a tiger retrieved her transformation pen “I believe this belongs to you.” you said holding onto the pen. “Chase Young, Pleased to meet you.” you said as you looked into her eyes. Mina’s heart skipped a beat and was just looking into your eyes with a blush on her face. “If you ever wish to see me again, come visit my home any time you wish.” “W-Where do you live?” In that moment, one of your tigers changed into a crow. Mina was surprised to say the least. “If you wish to see me, just ask the crow to lead you to my home. You and your sailor scout friends are welcome. As well as this little one.” you said as you began to scratch Artemis behind the ears. He couldn’t help but purr. Mina nodded and the crow jumped from your shoulder to hers. You and your other tiger left and Mina and Artemis did the same. “Just as I planned.” you thought to yourself. As she was walking Mina thought to herself “What is this feeling? I’ve never felt this way before.”
1532.title: Chase Young

15321.content:
(Rei Lita Amy Serena)

Back at the temple, Mina had just arrived and saw the others were waiting on her, even Serena. “Mina, you’re really late.” “Yeah, what kept ya?” “The fact that Serena got here before you means something must have happened.” “I’ll tell you exactly what happened.” Mina then explained to the others about the demon, about you, and even about the crow. Artemis confirmed everything she said and they were pretty shocked by what they heard. “So, who do you think he is?” “I only know his name, but he is an incredible martial artist.” “I see. Well maybe we should pay him a visit, being tomorrow is a Saturday, we have a whole day free.” “Right, we’ll meet at my house.” “Agreed.” “But there is something about that name that is so familiar.” “What do you mean Rei?” “Never mind.” All of the girls went home and later that night, Mina couldn’t stop thinking about you. But she still had no idea that from the moment she met you, she would go through the greatest inner battle of her life.
15321.title: A the Temple

153211.content:
(Wuya)

The next day, Mina and Artemis woke up early and the others had arrived at the house. The crow then landed on Mina’s shoulders and she asked it to take her and the others to your home. The crow nodded and took to the air. The girls followed the crow and it led them through a forest. Soon, they reached what looked like a barrier of some kind. But when they passed through it, they saw what the outside of your home looked like. They thought it was the scariest mountain they will ever see. But then, the crow changed back into a tiger and led them up the mountain. Soon, they found themselves at the entrance. Mina and Artemis entered with the others close behind. But as soon as she entered the door, Rei felt some powerful negative vibes form the place. “Welcome. I had been expecting you. Hello Mina.” “H-Hi Chase.” she said with a blush. “Come, I prepared a little feast for you and your friends.” you said as your jungle cats which included tigers, panthers and jaguars led them to the dining hall. As soon as Serena had saw the spread on the table, she immediately took a seat. The others followed suit and they all enjoyed the food you prepared for them. Lita was hoping to get the recipes from you. Artemis was having a good time as well. As soon as Serena was finished, they heard you walk into the room in the next level. “I trust your meal is satisfactory.” “It’s the best meal we’ve had in ages.” “I’m pleased that you’re enjoying yourselves.” you said as you snapped your fingers. The jungle cats took some of the plates away and brought seconds for those who wanted it. “You taught them to do that?” “Among other duties.” “We have to admit, you have been very hospitable.” “Thank you.” You said as you took a seat. One of your tigers brought you some soup. “What is that?” “It’s my special Lou Meng Long soup.” you said as you took a sip. But just hearing that name Rei figured out who you were. “Girls, I now know why his name is so familiar. He’s Chase Young, the prince of darkness.” “What are you talking about Rei?” “Trust me, I know what I am saying. He is the master of all evil.” “I do have a certain reputation.” All of the girls gasped, Artemis was surprised as well. “Is it true Chase, are you really evil?” “It’s true.” Mina fell back on her chair, whole the others were about to transform when the jungle cats surrounded them. “Now now, there is no need for a show of force my pets.” The cats backed off immediately. “Mina, we need to leave.” Mina was still in shock. “I can see she needs time to think.” “Think about what?” “Never mind Rei. Let’s just go.” “Mina, do you know what he’s talking about?” “I said let’s go!” she said with anger in her voice. You smiled when you heard this and the scouts left with Artemis in tow. “Everything is going perfectly.” Just the purple ghost of the Heylin witch Wuya entered the room. “So, what is your plan?” “I plan to bring one of them to join us.” “What, who? Which one?” “The chosen one. The one who I plan to have rule at my side for eternity.”
153211.title: The Next Day

1532111.content: Later on that night, Mina and the others were at the temple and they were talking about how to challenge you. But Mina took no part in this and went outside. “Mina, where are you going?” “I need some air.” she said walking outside. Artemis followed her and the both sat next to each other as they looked at the moon. “Mina, what’s on your mind?” “I don’t know Artemis. I guess…I’m in love with him.” “You mean with Chase?” “Please Artemis, don’t tell the others this. But when I first saw him I swear my heart skipped a beat. That’s never happened before.” Artemis sighed and said “I promise I won’t tell them. All I can say is that even if your feelings guide you toward him, I’ll be at your side.” Mina smiled and said “Thanks Artemis.” She then kissed him on the forehead and went inside to tell the others that she was heading home. Later on that night, Mina had trouble sleeping at first, being she couldn’t get you out of her mind. She looked at the moon and all she could see was your face and your smile. “I have to talk to him tomorrow.” she said before she fell asleep. Back at your palace, you were at your throne petting your jungle cats and said to yourself “Mina, soon you will join the Heylin side, by your own choice.”
1532111.title: Later

15321111.content:
(Please note, the only Shen Gong Wu I am bringing in here is the Golden Tiger Claws, Wushan Geyser, Reversin Mirror, Moby Morpher, the Serpents tail,the Yin and Yang Yo-Yo's and the Sphere of Yun) (Jack Spicer)

The next day, Mina got up early and so did Artemis and they left to go to your home. As the two of them were walking, they made it to your home in a short amount of time. As soon as they reached the door, Mina decided to knock. “Chase, it’s Mina. May I come in?” The door opened as soon as she asked and the two of them went inside. “Welcome Mina. I’m glad to see you visit me after what you learned yesterday.” “I…I am not sure why I am even ignoring the fact you are on the Heylin side.” “We will worry about that later. But for now, here.” you said handing her some kind of mirror, along with some kind of claws. “What is it?” “It is the Reversing Mirror and the Golden Tiger Claws. Wuya, enlighten her.” Wuya flew into the room and went inside Mina’s head and gave her the knowledge of the Shen Gong Wu and how to use it. “Thank you Chase.” “Anytime. Come, let’s go for a walk.” you said as you walked up to her and you both went outside with Wuya joining you. As the two of you were walking, you told Mina that she was free to join you anytime she wante to, which caused her to think very carefully. Soon, the two of you walked past a large construction site with a large amount of sand. “Wait! A new Shen Gong Wu has revealed itself, the Wushan Geyser. It’s here in the construction site.” “Come Mina. We can continue our walk in a moment.” you said as you walked into the site. It didn’t take you long before you found the geyser. But in that moment, the other scouts showed up and surrounded you. “We will talk to you later Mina.” “So, we meet again.” You then gave a whistle and your cats surrounded the other scouts. “Care to continue?” But then, the hand of a Cyclops grabbed one of your legs and it rose to the surface with a man named Jack Spicer riding on it. “Say hello to my little friend.” “Is this the best you can do Jack?” You then threw the Wushan Geyser into the air and kicked it into the Cyclops’s eye. He and Jack both feel into the sand. "The idea is adequate, but the execution is lacking. As are you." "Oh yeah? Well I got something you don't." "Very small hands?" "No. The sphere of Yun." Just then, you were trapped inside a cage and Jack began to gloat. "Now that I have you captured, the jungle cats are not in my control." He then snapped his fingers and the cats attacked the scouts. But he was far from finished, so he called them off and got back on Cyclops. "Don't bite off more than you can chew Spicer. It may come back to bite you." “Oh yeah, well let me ask you this, who would you rather be right now, me or you?” he said as they took you back to your home.
15321111.title: The Next Day

153211111.content: Back at your home, Jack was sitting on your throne while cyclops was playig with the skylight. "I got to hand it to you. This is one fine crib. And now it's my crib." "You should count your good fortune, while it lasts." Jack then began to gloat again. You yawned and said "Could you keep it down? I think I'll get some sleep." Wuya then appeared "Where's your evil genius now? Asleep in a cage like a parrot." "Oh, Jack, you know you were always my favorite." Jack then went to fight the sailor scouts. Back with the scouts, they were surprised that Spicer captured you. Jack then arrrived at the temple and they fought him off, though it was very difficult to do so with him in control of your jungle cats. Later on that night, Mina decided she would set you free.
153211111.title: Later

1532111111.content:
You were meditateing in your prison when Mina and Artemis appeared. "I didn't realise it was visiting hours." "I.. did not come for a visit." "So why are you here?" "To rescue you. Reversing mirror!" Just then the prison was destoyed and you walked over to Mina. "So have you reconsidered my offer to join me?" "No, I just couldn't leave you trapped by Jack." "You may be closer to joining me than you think with that little white lie." "I'm not lying." "Really? You mean you didn''t free me for your own self-interest? To stop that nitwit Jack Spicer?" "Well maybe a little." "Isn't that what evil is all about? A lie here, a little bad there. Suddenly it's so easy." You said as you took back your throne. "Oh Mina, you need to see this. You said as you changed into your dragon form Mina and Artemis were very surprised. "You see before you my true form, withouth the benefit of my potion." Mina looked at you for a moment and she said "I still see you as the same person." You smiled and transformed back before Jack arrived.

Back with the others, Rei noticed that Mina was gone when she wnt over to visit and told the others. They knew where she had gone and rushed off to your home.

Bac with you, Jack had just returned to your home and got off the cyclopse and walked over to you. "How's it going Mr. I used to be somebody evil?" "It goes well. And you?" "Better than you could say, old evil relic." He then noticed the destroyed pison. "Hey, how did you get over here when I left you over there? Please don't hurt me! I'm frail, and I bruise easily." "I was always with you Chase. At least in spirit." You then walked over to Jack. "There is one thing I want to know." "Yes, anything." "Who would you rather be right now? You...." you then transformed "Or me?" "You?" "Care to watch Mina?" Mina then decided to watch while leaning against the pillar. "I dont think so. Jack Bots, attack!" he said as a massive number of robots came in and attacked you and Mina. You changed back and the two of you wokked together and destroyed them with ease. You then charged at Jack and grabbed onto his neck. "You might want to look away Mina." Mina didn't listen and decided to watch, you knew her choice and you broke Jack's neck and killed him. The Cyclopse charged at you, but Mina got in front of him and used her crescent beam right in his eye. The beam went through his head and killed him. "Much obliged, though I had it under control." "I know you did."
1532111111.title: Mina's Choice

15321111111.content:
(Dark Venus http://blackpink134.deviantart.com/art/D...)

Just then, the other scouts showed up and saw what had happened. "How did Chase get out?" "I released him." "Mina, why would you do that?" "It's not your concren anymore Sailor Scouts." Mina then walked over to you and leaned p against your chest and you put one arm around her. "I have decided to stay with Chase. So if you need Artemis and I, you can find us on the Heylin side." "You have made a wise choice my dear. At last, the prophesy has been relaized." you said as you raised your hand and a bolt of lightning came through the skylight and struck both you and Mina. When the light faded, they noticed Mina looked different. She also had a dark aura around her. "Now that you have chosen the Heylin way, I will rule the world with you at my side." Mina nodded and you snapped your fingers and Artemis turned into a white tiger. "Mina, don't do this. Many people look up to you." "Its too late Serena. The Mina you knew is gone. Form now on, you will call me Dark Venus." "You are no longer welcome in our home. Leave now." you said as the many jungle cats surrounded you. The scouts thought they could fight them off, but you snapped your fingers again and each of the changed into some kind of warrior. They knew they were beaten an they had to leave. And with that, a new age of darkness was ready to begin.
15321111111.title: Dark Venus

153211111111.content: Once the scouts had left your home, you created a throne for Mina to sit at your side. “I’m happy that you had chosen the Heylin side.” “I’m pretty happy myself. I want to be at your side for eternity.” “That is what I had planned. I will train you to become a martial artist like me.” “And what happens when my training is complete?” “You will be ready for the Lou Meng Long soup.” “Excellent. And I can feel that my powers are much stronger than they were before.” “I see you are truly embracing the darkness. Come, sit on your throne.” You and Mina walked over to your thrones and sat down. Artemis lied next to Mina and she began to stroke his head.
153211111111.title: Later

1532111111111.content: Back at Rei’s temple, the girls were extremely surprised tat Mina had turned to the Heylin side. “It doesn’t make sense, Mina has always been a straight arrow.” “Maybe Chase corrupted her somehow.” “Whatever the case, we have to try and get her back to the way she was.” “That is going to be extremely difficult.” “What do you mean Rei?” "Let me tell you what I know about this guy. Chase Young was once on the side of good, but he traded his soul for a potion that would keep him you and alive forever.” “You think it was that Lou Meng Long soup of his?” “Yes. But if Mina drinks that, she will be just as evil as he is, forever.” “We have to stop him.” The girls agreed that they would try and save Mina before you turned her evil, if they could.
1532111111111.title: At the Temple

15321111111111.content: As the girls were making a plan, you were training Mina in order to turn her into a true martial artist. “Are you ready Mina?” “Yes, let’s begin.” She charged towards you and fought with a nice amount of skill. “Very good Mina, you know how to fight well enough.” “Thank you for the compliment.” “Now your lessons begin.” You then fought back and she dodged a few of them. “It is not the strongest opponent who wins, but the strongest will.” “I understand.” “There will be strong opponents in the future, so will have to fight until he cannot fight anymore.” Mina then made punch and you blocked it with your palm. “When fighting an opponent with superior strength, you must use his strength against him.” You both continued to train in the martial arts for about two hours before she was at her peak. “Excellent work Mina. Only one more thing remains until you are ready.” “Thank you, my love.” “It seems there really such a thing as dark love.” You said as the two of you went back to your throne to rest before having a nice meal.
15321111111111.title: The Training Begins
