15431222212.title: Nope

choices: A girl with long blond hair in an odango fasion slams into you. (Serena)
You see a girl with brown hair in a ponytail talking to a friend of hers. (Lita)
154312222121.content:
Your name is (name). You were born on (month/date/year). When you were young, you had a fairly normal childhood. You lived with your loving parents in a small town in America. Your mother was a kind and caring young man who worked for a company. Your father on the other hand was a bit unusual. Not in the crazy way, but in a magical way. He had the ability to perform magic. You loved how he performed magic tricks. He didn't perform tricks like a magician, but he did magic attacks and other many forms of magic. You thought it was so cool that you wanted to learn how to use the magic your dad did. Your dad was reluctant at first, but then he decided to teach you. He taught you everything he knew from attack spells, element spells and many others. The teaching was difficult at first, but eventually you were as good as your father. Your father was proud and you thought he was the best in the world. Everything was wonderful until one day, everything changed. One night, you woke up in the middle of the night by a strange sound. You went to inspect it and you saw your father saying goodbye to your mother, but your father looked different. He was wearing a full body suit with a cape and he was also wearing a helmet. When you saw him, you were amazed.

Young (name): Daddy? Is that you?

Your mom jumped in surprise and when she saw you, she tried to hide your father in his new attire.

Your Mom: (name)! Son. I can explain! ....

Your Father: It's all right honey. He was bound to find out sooner or later. May I have a spare moment with him?

Your mother stepped back and your father kneeled down, took off his helmet and spoke to you.

Your Father: Son. It's time I told you the truth. About everything. Would you care to listen to your dear old father?

Young (name): Sure Daddy.

You father then told you everything. He revealed that he was actually from another world in a different galaxy and that he was a guardian to protect the world from evil. He was known as the Solaris Knight. Also the training from your father was preparation for you to carry on your father's legacy. At first it was a bit overwhelming to you, but you understood every word.

(name): So you're a superhero that saves people Daddy?

Your Father: That's right. And right now I have to go and save my friends. I have just been called to join them in battle.

Young (name): Will you be back soon Daddy?

Your Father: I don't know son, but I want you to know that I love you no matter what. And take care of your mother as well too.

Young (name): I will Daddy.

Your Father: And here. I want you to have something.

Your father took out a strange looking phone and a small framed picture of you and your father and mother and handed them both to you.

Your Father: These are for you. I bear the responsibility for protecting this world and someday you will too. Just remember, don't ever lose to evil. Protect this world from evil and if you're ever feeling alone, I'll always be with you.

You looked at your gifts and then at your father. You gave your father a determined look and nodded.

Young (name): I promise. I won't let you down Dad

That was the very last time you saw your father. A few years had passed since your father disappeared. You now were going to a new school, but it was all the way in Tokyo. So you and your mother left America and moved all the way from Tokyo. At first you missed your previous home in America for it always reminded you of your father, but you were open to a new experience. You were on your way to your new school, but you were feeling a little nervous.

(name): OK. This is it. I can do this.

Then you heard a beep and vibration in your pocket. You pulled your phone which happened to be the phone that your father gave you and answered it. It was your mother.

Your Mom: Hi sweetie. Did you get to school OK?

(name): Mom. I'm fine. Don't worry. I'm coming up to the school now. You don't have to call me every few minutes.

Your Mom: Sorry honey. I just worry about you so much ever since....you know.

(name): Mom it's OK. I'll be fine. Besides Dad wouldn't want you to feel sad. Be happy okay?

Mom: Hahaha. You're just like him. Always positive. Well I better let you go. Have fun okay?

(name): Kay mom. Love you.

Mom: Love you too son.

Then your mom hang up. You sighed and laughed to yourself.

(name): Hahaha. That's mom for you. Always being worried.

Soon you arrived at the school gates of Juuban Municipal. You dug in your chest and pulled out a landyard with a picture if you and your father and looked at it. You couldn't help, but think about that faithful day when your father left. You lightly clenched your picture and looked up in the sky.

(name) thinking: Well Dad, I'm finally ready to see the world and make new friends. I promise you'll be proud of me. I'll do whatever it takes to be just like you, so please.......watch over me.

You had just walked past the school gates when....
154312222121.title: Solar Power!

1543122221212.content:
You had just walked past the school gates when you see a young girl with brown hair in a ponytail. She was of course Lita aka Sailor Jupiter, but you would know this later. When you saw her, you were amazed.

(name): Whoa... Who is that? She's.....she's beautiful.

As you walked into the school, you couldn't stop staring at her. You were staring at her so much that you didn't watch where you were going. Then you bumped into something hard and fell flat on your back. You looked up to see three boys standing over you. The one in the middle was the one you bumped into, and he wasn't happy that you bumped into him.

Middle Boy: Hey! Watch where you're going punk!

(name): Oops! Sorry about that.

You got up and politely apologized to them. Unfortunately, the boys weren't gonna let you off easy. The right boy got up in your face looking like he was trying to pick a fight with you.

Right boy: If you're really sorry, you'd get on your knees and give me your lunch money.

Left boy: You better do it now, otherwise we're gonna have to beat you up for hurting our boss.

(name): Hey! I said I was sorry. And there's no way I'm gonna do that!

Right boy: Fine! I guess. We're gonna have to beat you up kid.

All three of them surrounded you so you couldn't escape. You took a defensive stance ready to defend yourself. Then you heard voice and Lita came up.

Lita: Hey! Back off. He said he was sorry and frankly he barely tapped you. That's low picking on him like that.

Right boy: What'd you say?!?

Left boy: No one talks to us like that!

The left boy charged forward and attempted to punch Lita, but Lita caught him and flipped him with a judo throw. The right boy tried to attack Lita as well, but Lita side stepped out of the way and kneed him hard in the gut. You gaped in wonder seeing Lita's fighting skills.

(name) thinking: Whoa! She's amazing! Not only is she beautiful, but she's got strength and fighting skills to boot!

Then you noticed the middle guy behind Lita. He pulled something that made your blood freeze. A knife.

(name): Oh my gosh! He's gonna stab that girl with the knife! I gotta do something!

That's when you....
1543122221212.title: You see a girl with brown hair in a ponytail ta...

15431222212122.content:
(name): Look out behind you!

Everything seemed to go in slow motion. Lita looked behind her in time to see you step between her and the middle guy with the knife. The knife was close to nailing you in the face, but you turned your head and dodged it. Then you smacked the knife out of the guy's hand and gave him a powerful punch in the gut knocking the wind out of him. The middle guy was motionless for a moment, then he fell down to the ground. The middle guy's other two guys as well as Lita all stared at you in shock.

Right guy: Oh crap! He beat the boss!

Left guy: Oh man! Grab him and let's scram!

The guys quickly grabbed their leader and they ran for the hills. Lita turned around and came up to you.

Lita: Whew. That was close. You saved my skin. Thank you.

(name): No problem. Couldn't let stand by while a beautiful girl is getting attacked from behind

Lita blushed from your compliment, then she gasped.

Lita: Oh no! Your hand!

You looked at your right hand and saw that you had a gash on it. It was a big cut, but to you it wasn't that big of a deal.

(name): Oh. Don't worry. It's just a scratch. I'll take care of it when I have time.

Lita: No way! Now hold still.

Before you could protest anymore, Lita dug into her pocket pulled out a handkerchief and tied it around your hand over your wound. As she tied it on, you couldn't help, but blush seeing Lita so close to you. Your heart began to beat like a drum.

Lita: There we go. You should be okay know.

(name): But.....is this okay? I mean, your handkerchief is gonna get all dirty.

Lita: It's okay. It's the least I can do after you saved me like that.

Then she looked at her watch and then she got up.

Lita: Anyway, I gotta go. See you later.

(name): Hey wait! Tell me your name at least!

Lita: It's Lita! See you!

Before you could ask anything more about her, Lita had already raced into the distance. All you could do is watch Lita disappear.

(name): Wow. So Lita's her name. She's an incredible woman. Not to mention kind and strong. (sigh) I hope I can see her again.

Suddenly the school began to ring snapping you out of your thoughts.

(name): Oh crap! That's the bell! Oh man! I'm gonna be late on my first day! Damn it!

Then you raced off to class hoping that you wouldn't be late. Then.....
15431222212122.title: Save her.

choices: A blonde girl with a red bow in her hair comes up to you. (Mina)
A blonde girl with buns and long pigtails comes up to you (Serena
154312222121221.content:
Later in class you managed to make it by the time the final bell rung. But you ran into another problem. You got lost trying to find your classroom. You had no idea where to go or what to do? You looked down hallways and you looked up stairs, but you couldn't find your classroom. To you it was like a maze.

(name): Oh come on! Where the heck am I supposed to go?

You were just about to give up, but then a voice called out to you. You turned to find a young woman named Ms. Haruna walking up to you.

Ms. Haruna: There you are! I've been looking everywhere for you. Are you (name)?

(name): Yes I am.

Ms Haruna: Good. I'm Ms. Haruna your teacher. When you didn't show up, I figured you were lost. So I came to get you.

(name): Thank goodness. Sorry about this. I didn't mean to cause you any trouble.

Ms. Haruna: It's okay. Just make sure it doesn't happen again. Now come on, let's get you to your new classroom okay?

With that, Ms. Haruna led you to the classroom. Soon you both stopped outside a classroom.

(name) thinking: This must be it.

Ms. Haruna: Okay. I'm gonna go settle the class down and take roll. You stay out here. I'll let you know when to come in okay?

(name): Yes ma'am.

Then Ms. Haruna went in leaving you alone. At this point, you excited and nervous at the same time.

(name): Okay. This is it. This is going to be my new classroom. I hope I can make some friends here. Maybe I'll even get a girlfriend here.

Then you looked at your hand where Lita bandaged your wound. You couldn't help, but think about Lita and her kindness for saving you and using her handkerchief to cover up your cut.

(name): Wow. That girl sure was kind. She would make the perfect girlfriend. What was her name? Lita I think. Man, she sure was pretty. I think I'm in love. I wish I could see her again. Maybe she'll be in my class. Okay! Calm down. You have to relax! Relax!

Then you heard Ms Haruna speak to the class.

Ms. Haruna: Now listen up class. Today I have an important announcement to make. We have a new transfer student tin our class today. He's from America and I expect you all to give him a warm welcome. His name is.....(name). You can come in now!

(name): Okay! Here goes!

You plucked up your courage and walked in the classroom. When you came in you stood in front of the class and bowed politely.

(name): Hello. It's nice to meet all of you. I hope we all can be good friends.

Then you took your seat and class began. A little later it was the lunch period. You thought that this was the perfect opportunity to find some new friends. You looked around to find some one to hang with, but you couldn't find anyone. Then.....
154312222121221.title: Later in class.....

choices: The shrine where Serena and the others hang out.
1543122221212212.content:
Just then, a blonde girl with buns in her hair came up to you. She was of course Serena also know as Sailor Moon and also known as the princess Serenity, but you didn't know this yet.

Serena: Hello! You're (name) am I right?

(name): Um....yeah. That's me.

Serena: Hi! I'm Serena. It's nice to meet you. I noticed you hadn't made any new friends yet, so I thought I'd introduce myself. Hehehe.

(name): It's nice to meet you Serena. You know, it's a good thing you came. I haven't really made friends because there's hardly anyone around. Why is that?

Serena: I think it's because they're scared of you.

(name): Of me? Why?

Serena: Well, I can't really explain it, but I heard people say that you're a guy that loves to fight because they saw a fight you got into today.

(name) thinking: Oh crap. So that's how it it is.

Serena: But don't worry, I don't think you're scary at all. In fact, you seem like a really sweet guy.

(name): Well thank you for saying so Serena. That's really nice of you.

Serena: Hey! I got an idea! After school, how about I introduce you to some of my friends? They'd really love to meet you! And I can show you the arcade where me and the girls hang out!

(name): Sure. I'd like that very much.

Serena: Yay! You're gonna love my friends and you're gonna love living here too!

Then the bell began to ring signaling that the lunch period was over.

Serena: Well, I gotta get back to class! I'll see you after school (name)!

(name): See you then Serena!

And with that Serena dashed back to class. As you watched Serena leave, you were all smiles.

(name): Awesome! I finally made a friend! Even if it's one, that's awesome! And I'm gonna make some more friends after school!

Then you remembered Lita and you looked at your hand where her bandana was tied.

(name): Still, I wish I could see that Lita girl. I would have loved to be her friend. Hehehe. Maybe even something more. Hahaha!

As you daydreamed about Lita, you couldn't help but get a silly grin on your face. Then you snapped out of your love daze and hurried back to class. Then later after school you met Serena after class and you walked with her to....
1543122221212212.title: A blonde girl with buns and long pigtails comes...

15431222212122122.content:
When you went to The Game Center with Serena, you were amazed. There were arcade games as far as the eye could see. There was crane games, racing games, and fighting games too. One thing was for sure, you had never been to an arcade before, but you were loving being in one.

(name): Wow Serena. This place is amazing!

Serena: Have you been to the arcade before?

(name): Nope. This is the first time for me.

Serena: What? Man, you've been missing out. Come on! I'll show you one of my favorite games.

Serena then led you to an arcade game called Sailor V or something like that. Then she inserted a quarter and began to play so she could show you how it's done. At first she was doing fine, but then at some point she began to get overwhelmed by enemies and she ended up losing.

Serena: Oh man! Well, I guess I didn't do too bad since it's been a while. Well (name), wanna give it a go?

(name): Sure. I don't know if I'll be good, but I'll do my best.

Then it was your turn to play. It was a little awkward for you at first, but then you started to get the hang of it. You blasted lots of monsters which earned you more and more points.

Serena: Wow! You're pretty good at this!

(name): You think so?

At first your score was about ten thousand, but then to Serena's surprise, the score began to climb higher and higher. Soon your score was up to fifty thousand and counting. Unknown to you, a crowd was forming and everyone was watching you play the game. They were all amazed.

Serena: Oh man. He's even better than I thought. He might even beat Amy's score!

Your score was now up to ninety nine thousand and you were about to face the big boss. You engaged the boss and gave it everything you got. Then when boss was weak enough, you blasted it one more time and you defeated the big boss.

(name): Yes!!! I did it!!!

Then the crowd that was watching you playing erupted cheers and applause. You nearly fell over in surprise seeing the huge crowd. You pushed through the crowd to find Serena. You found her chatting to a guy with blonde hair.

(name): Hey Serena!

Serena: Oh! (name)! I want you to meet someone! This is Andrew. He works here at the game center.

Andrew: Nice to meet you (name).

(name): Oh. Nice to meet you Andrew.

Andrew: So I take it you like to play games as much Serena does?

(name): Not really. To be perfectly honest, it's my first time playing a game like that.

Andrew and Serena: Seriously?!?

Serena: But you're so good! Not to mention you got the highest score.

(name): Hehehe. It was nothing really. I noticed all the patterns in the game and stuff so it was pretty easy to....

Before you could finish explaining, you looked at the clock. It was getting late and your mother was probably getting worried about you.

(name): Sorry Serena. Sorry Andrew, but I gotta get home. My mom's probably wondering where I'm at.

Serena: Oh sorry about that. I don't want your mom to worry. Hey by the way, I'd like you to meet some friends of mine tomorrow. I'll introduce you to them tomorrow after school if you want.

(name): Sure! I'm always looking for some new friends. Anyway, I'll see you Serena. Take care!

And with that, you dashed out of The Game Center and set off for home. Then......
15431222212122122.title: The Game Center

154312222121221221.content:
On the way back home, you were hoping to get home as quickly as you could and were eager to tell your mom about your day.

(name): Oh wow! I can't wait to tell my mom! I not only had an awesome day at school, but I made some new friends! Can this day get any more awesome?

Suddenly just as you rounded a corner, you saw something or rather someone. It was a young man who wearing a blue gray suit with a green trim. His hair brown and tied to a ponytail and he seemed to floating in the air with in a veil of flowers. He was Zoisite third commander of The Dark Kingdom. When you saw him you had a bad feeling like your body was instinctively warning you to be careful. He stalked around the house and seemed to be looking for something. One thing was for sure, he definitely looked suspicious. You hid behind the corner and peeked out so he couldn't see you.

(name): Who the heck is that? Whoever he is, he looks suspicious. I wonder what he's up to?

You hid behind a wall so he couldn't see you. Then Zoisite pulled out a black prism. The prism began to glow and a bright light came out of it. It looked like he was using the crystal to track something.

Zoisite: According to this, the person who has the next rainbow crystal should be right around here.

(name) thinking: Rainbow crystal? Why would he searching for a crystal in a place like this? Maybe he's some kind of thief. A wanted international thief that steals jewels and other stuff just to make money or something. I wonder if I should call the cops.

Then as you took a step to try to get closer, your foot hit a can with a loud clang. You quickly hid back, worried that Zoisite heard you. There was a long silence. It was so quiet that the only sound you heard what your heart pounding in your chest.

(name) thinking: Man! That guy definitely heard me for sure! OK. Just stay calm (name). Maybe he didn't hear you. Maybe he thought that you were a stray cat or something.

You looked back to see where Zoisite was, but you looked only to find that he had disappeared.

(name): What the.... Where did he go? I'm sure I saw him just a second ago.

Then Zoisite appeared behind you making your heart nearly jump out of your chest.

Zoisite: What have we here? A little spy?

(name): Uh oh! Busted!

Zoisite: You know little boy, it's very rude to spy on people.

You were a little scared, but you bravely stood your ground.

(name): Hey you! I don't know you are, but your not getting your hands on that rainbow crystal or whatever you're looking for! Not while I'm around!

Zoisite: Hm. You're pretty brave for a little boy. And you know? Such bravery is deserving of a sporting chance.

(name): A sporting chance?

Zoisite: Here's what I'll do, I'll give you ten seconds. In that five seconds, I want you to turn around, walk away, and forget that you ever saw me. If you're still here by the time I get to ten, I will make you wish that you had never seen me.

(name): What?

Zoisite: One......two......three......

As Zoisite counted down, you looked around,. There was no one to be seen for miles which was perfect. You knew that Zoisite was no ordinary man and you knew that you couldn't let him get away so you had only one option. You had to fight him.

(name) thinking: There's no way that I'm gonna get this guy get away. I can't fight this guy using normal tactics like with those thugs. Which means I'm gonnna have to take him with my my magic. It's been a long time since I had to use magic, but it's my only option. I'll just use a spell to catch him off guard and then I'll turn him in to the authorities.

Zoisite: Four........Five........Six........

You took a defensive stance and prepared yourself to fight. Zoisite seeing you getting ready to fight began to get slightly annoyed.

Zoisite: Seven.......Eight.......Nine.........

(name) thinking: Here goes nothing.

Then when Zoisite was about to say ten......
154312222121221221.title: On the way.....

1543122221212212211.content:
Right when Zoisite was about to say ten, you immediately went on the attack!

(name): Take this!

You unleashed a powerful blast of energy at Zoisite. Zoisite immediately dodged and landed on the ground safely.

Zoisite: What the....!! How did you do that?!?

You answered him by launching another spell at him.

(name): Easy. I did this!

A fire ball shot from your hand. Zoisite disappeared to dodge the fireball. Then Zoisite reappeared behind you and and unleashed an attack of his own. A swarm of flower petals surrounded him and then they turned into needles. Zoisite waved his hand and fired the needles straight toward you.

Zoisite: Zoi!

(name): Oh no you don't!

You waved your hands and a barrier protected you from the needles. Zoisite then landed on the ground and you dispelled your barrier. At the moment, you two were at a stand still.

Zoisite: I must say, I'm impressed. You're definitely not an ordinary human. But if you think you stand a chance against me just because of that, you got another thing coming!

Zoisite then disappeared and reappeared in front of you in a blinding speed. Then he proceeded to punch you, but luckily you narrowly dodged it. You countered with a punch of your own, but Zoisite dodged the blow. You punched and you punched and you even kicked, but Zoisite dodged every blow like it was nothing.

Zoisite: Is that the best you can do kid?

(name): I'm not finished yet!

This time you fired a spell at Zoisite which he dodged, but this time you closed in and gave Zoisite a powerful punch in the face. Zoisite reeled back and and staggered in surprise. Zoisite now had a line of blood coming of his mouth. He wiped his lip and saw the blood. He gave you a look of pure anger.

Zoisite: You little bastard! You scarred my precious face! I'll make you pay for that!

You stood your ground and got ready for Zoisite's next move. Zoisite who was now extremely mad and was ready to kill you, but then a voice rang out.

Voice: Stop right there Zoisite!

Zoisite: What?

(name): Who said that?

You looked around trying to find where the voice was coming from. You looked on top of wall and there standing there was a young girl. She was wearing a sailor uniform with a red bow. She wore red boots, was wearing a tiara on her head and had a familiar pair of buns and pigtails. She leaped down from the wall and stood between you and Zoisite.

(name): What in the world? Who is that?

Zoisite: Grr! Sailor Moon. Always showing up at the most annoying times.

(name) thinking: Sailor Moon? Is that who this girl is? What is she? Some kind of super heroine? And why does she look so familiar?

Sailor Moon: I don't what's going on here, but I do know that you're up to no good Zoisite! In the name of the moon, I'll punish you!

Zoisite: You always had a nasty habit of butting in. As much as I want to destroy you Sailor Moon, I'm a bit busy right now. This boy just scarred my beautiful face and I must make him pay. So you'll have to wait your turn.

Sailor Moon: Hey! Don't ignore me!

Zoisite: Now then...prepare to die boy!

Zoisite then went on the attack again gunning straight for you, but quickly fired a spell. Zoisite disappeared and reappeared again and then fired a force of energy at you. You were blown back a little, but managed to stand your ground. Sailor Moon watched your fight with surprise and awe.

Sailor Moon: Wow! How is he doing that?!?

You and Zoisite kept firing blast after blast trying to at least get one hit in on each other. Then Zoisite fired an energy past that went right past you and hit a telephone pole.

(name): Oh come on! You completely missed!

Zoisite said nothing. He just gave you grin that made you feel a little uneasy. Then you heard a creaking then you that the telephone pole was falling and it was falling toward Sailor Moon.

Sailor Moon: Eeeekk!!

(name): Watch out!

You fired a spell right at the pole falling. It exploded with a mighty boom, but Sailor Moon was out of danger. Unfortunately, you left yourself wide open, for Zoisite took advantage of the distraction and fired an enregy attack right at you sending you sprawling to the ground. Then Zoisite stood over you and made a sword made of crystal appear. He raised it and prepared to strike.

Sailor Moon: Oh no! Look out!

Zoisite: Now you die!

You thought that it was the end for you, but then....
1543122221212212211.title: You attacked Zoisite

15431222212122122112.content:
Suddenly, a giant bolt of lightning flashed between you and Zoisite stopping his attack and saving you at the same time. Then a young girl with a familiar brown hair in a ponytail landed in front of you. She was wearing the exact same outfit as Sailor Moon, but hers had different colors. She was Sailor Jupiter. Another of the Sailor Scouts. When you saw her, you couldn't help but stare in awe of her.

Sailor Moon: Sailor Jupiter!

Sailor Jupiter: Sorry I'm late Sailor Moon. (turns to you) Hey kid. You okay?

You looked up to see Jupiter extending her hand offering to help you up. You took her hand and she helped you to your feet. You didn't know why, but you couldn't take your eyes off of Sailor Jupiter. For some reason you felt like you had seen this girl somewhere before. You just couldn't put your finger on it. Sailor Jupiter was of course Lita, but you didn't know this yet.

(name): Y-yes. I'm fine. Thank you.

Just then, two more girls jumped in out of nowhere and behind Zoisite making him surrounded. One of them was a girl with blue hair and the other had long black hair. They were also wearing outfits just like Sailor Moon and Jupiter and had their own different colors as well. They were Sailor Mercury and Sailor Mars. When Zoisite saw them he was more annoyed than ever.

Zoisite: So the rest of them have come huh? How annoying!

Sailor Mecury: Okay Zoisite! You're evil ways stop right now!

Sailor Mars: We won't stand by while you attack innocent people! So if you wanna fight someone then fight us!

Sailor Moon: Oh you guys! Thank you so much! You saved our butts!

Sailor Mars: Well we wouldn't have had to if you had just showed up when you had to!

Sailor Moon: Oh come on Mars! I couldn't help it! Give me a break!!

Sailor Mars: Yeah right Meatball head! You probably were fooling around with Darien or something!

Sailor Moon: Grrrr!!!! That's all you ever say! Serena, you're an idiot! Serena, you're dumb! Serena, stop being lovey dovey! All you ever do is be mean! Well I'm more mature than you!!! Blblblbblbl!!!

Sailor Mars: Get real Meatball head! Blblblbllb!!!

For some reason, Sailor Moon and Mars got into an argument and were having some kind of sticking out your tongue contest. You and the other Sailors all sweatdropped and couldn't believe that they were fighting at a time like this.

(name): Uhhh......Are they always like this?

Sailor Jupiter: Sadly yes. But don't worry they're best friends when push comes to shove.

(name): Well I hate to say it, but with friends like that who needs enemies?

Sailor Mercury: Hey you guys! Stay focused! We're dealing with Zoisite remember?

Zoisite who was standing in the sidelines made readied himself for a fight. After all it was five against one now. Six if that included you.

Zoisite: Well, well. The Sailors Scouts. As much as I want to deal with you right now, I'll deal with you later, My business is with that boy. So if you know what's good for you, you'll hand over the boy and leave.

You took a defensive stance and got ready to fight again, but then the sailors stood between you and Zoisite protecting you.

Sailor Mars: No way! You have to get by us first!

Sailor Mercury: That's right! We won't let you!

Sailor Jupiter: We'll protect him no matter what. So you might as well give up.

Sailor Moon: That's right! We can't sit by while you go around hurting innocent people. In the name of the moon.....

Sailor Moon, Mercury, Mars, and Jupiter: We'll punish you.

Zoisite: Fine then! I'll just destroy all of you at once!

Zoisite got ready to fight and so did the sailors. You got ready to fight as well, but Jupiter placed her hand on your shoulder and calmed you down.

Sailor Jupiter: Don't worry. We'll take it from here. Stand back okay?

(name): Um....yeah. Sure.

You stepped back and did as you were told. Zoisite was more than ready to begin the fight, but suddenly a voice rang in his head making him stop.

Voice: Zoisite! Cease your attack immediately!

Zoisite: Kunzite?

Voice: You must retreat. It's an order from Queen Beryl.

Zoisite: But Kunzite.....

Voice: Now! You don't want to upset Queen Beryl do you?

Hearing that, Zoisite had no choice but to do what the voice said.

Zoisite: Sorry Sailor Scouts, but something came up. I'll let you all live. For now.

(name): Hey you! Come back here!

Then he looked at you with great hate on his face.

Zoisite: You got lucky this time boy. But the next time we meet, I'll personally see to it that it will be the last.

Then he disappeared in a storm of flowers. You let out a sigh of relief seeing him disappear. You could now rest easy.

(name): Whew. That was close. At least he's gone. Anyway thanks for saving me Sail.....what?

You turned to the Sailors wanting to thank them, but they were nowhere to be found. It was like they disappeared into thin air.

(name): What the heck? Where'd they go? I wanted to thank them for saving me.

Then the lights from the street lamps began to flicker and turn on which meant that it was getting late.

(name): Oh crap! I better get home! Mom's probably worried sick about me!

You dashed away towards your house not wanting to make your mom worry. Unbeknownst to you, four figures watched as you ran towards home. Then they disappeared into the night.
15431222212122122112.title: The other Sailors come.

154312222121221221121.content:
Meanwhile back in The Dark Kingdom, Zoisite teleported back and made it safely, but he was livid about coming back and not getting revenge for what you did to him.

Zoisite: Damn it! How dare that little brat do that to me! I swear when I see him I'll....

Then a young man with long silver hair with blue-grey eyes appeared. He was Kunzite. Another one of Queen Beryl's loyal generals and considered to be one of the most powerful in entire Dark Kingdom. And he's also Zoisite's lover.

Kunzite: Calm down Zoisite. It isn't good for you to be angry like this.

Zoisite: Kunzite! How can I be calm after what that boy did to me!? He scarred my precious face!

Kunzite: A boy? A mere boy was able to wound you?

Zoisite: He was far from ordinary! He was using some kind of sorcery! I swear when I see him again I'll....

Kunzite. Enough. Queen Beryl is requesting your presence immediately.

Zoisite: How cruel. You don't even care. You mean Kunzite.

Kunzite: You know that's not true Zoisite. I'll always care about you my love.

Zoisite turned away. Then Kunzite smiled and made a rose materialize in his hands. Zoisite still had his head turned, but when Kunzite handed him the flower he gratefully accepted it.

Kunzite: There. You look much better when you're smiling.

Zoisite: Thank you Kunzite. You always make me smile my love.

Kunzite: And don't you worry. When I find the boy who did this to you, I'll personally see to it that he pays.

Zoisite: Oh Kunzite....thank you.

Kunzite: Come. Let's so see Queen Beryl now.

A little later in throne room...

Kunzite: We're here just as you requested Queen Beryl.

Zoisite: My queen. Why did you stop me? I could have easily have defeated those Sailor Scouts. Not to mention that I was in the middle of searching for a rainbow crystal.

Queen Beryl: Orders have been given by the great ruler.

Zoisite: Orders?

Kunzite: What are they my queen?

Queen Beryl: The two of you are to go on a mission. You must find a very powerful item known as The Sword of Darkness.

Kunzite: The Sword of Darkness?

Queen Beryl: The Sword of Darkness was wielded by a powerful warrior who served The Dark Kingdom many years ago. He was one of the most strongest warriors that ever existed. Until the day that we suffered a great loss to our enemy. After the rainbow crystals were sealed, he was sealed away in his own sword never to be seen again until now. The Great Ruler has located the sword and now wants the sword found.

Zoisite: But why my queen?

Queen Beryl: I don't need to explain myself to you.

There was a long pause. Then Kunzite bowed.

Kunzite: Very well. We shall get the sword and bring it to you at once my queen. Where is the sword located?

Queen Beryl: You will find it here.

Queen Beryl waved her crystal ball and a picture formed. It was a picture of forest with cave close to town.

Queen Beryl: Now go. And don't let the Sailor Scouts stop you.

Zoisite and Kunzite: At once Queen Beryl.

Then Kunzite and Zoisite left to go retrieve the sword. Meanwhile back at your place, you had just made it home. Your mom was a little upset that you were home a little late, but she was glad that you were home safe. Then after you ate dinner and washed up, you got ready for bed. As you lied you in your bed, you thoughts were filled about everything that you experienced. Meeting Serena, going to the arcade, going through the ordeal of fighting Zoisite and having the Sailor Scouts save you.

(name) Man. What an incredible first day I had. I'll say this much about this town, there's definitely never a dull moment. Although it would have been awesome if I never ran into that guy. And those Sailor Scouts. I wonder who they really are. For some reason, I feel like I've seen them before. Nah. No way. (yawn) Oh well. I guess I better get some sleep. I got school tomorrow and a chance to make more friends.

Then you fell asleep.
154312222121221221121.title: In the dark kingdom....

155.content: One day, the sailor scouts were in a fight with a large creature from the negaverse. The monster was very powerful and was about to finish off Sailor Venus, when they heard someone yell "CHAOS SPEAR!" Just then, a spear made of energy slached the monster's wrists and it roared in pain. as the sailor scouts and the monster turned their heads, they saw a siloet in the sun. "WHO ARE YOU?!" asked the monster. You then said "I am the champion of truth, the warrior of light, the King of Hearts. I am Solaris Knight! Now, you lay one more hand on Sailor Venus, I will obliterate you!" The monster clenched its fist and threw a punch at Sailor Venus. Venus closed her eyes and waited for the punch to hit her. But just before Venus was struck, she heard an impact, but didn't feel any pain. She opened her eyes and saw that you blocked the monster's punch with just one hand. She was amazed at your strength and she heard you say to the creature, "Don't say I didn't warn you." You then used your hand to push the creatures fist back and you jumped into the air. Your right hand began to glow and you yelled "SHINING FINGER!!!" A huge energy blast came from your hand and destroyed the monster instantly. You then landed on the ground and Venus just stared at you with lust. You walked over to her and offered her your hand and helped her up like a gentleman. Venus thought that she hit the jack-pot. As you helped Venus up to her feet, the other scouts asked why you were here. You told them that you were around when the creature appeared. Then Sailor Mercury asked what you were looking for. You then said "I will tell you all tomorrow. Where shall we meet?" Then Sailor Venus said you could all meet at the temple that belongs to Sailor Mars. You agreed and you said "Until tomorrow Sailor Scouts. CHAOS CONTROL!" Just then, a flash of light flared from where you were standing, and when the light faded, you were gone. The scouts thought you teleported yourself to another location. Venus couldn't wait to see you again.
155.title: King of Hearts

1551.content: The next day, Mina and the others were at Rei's temple waiting for you to show up. They waited for about ten minutes and then they saw someone coming up the stairs. They knew it was you. When you got to the top of the temple, the girls saw your face and they all began to lust for you. Mina, however loved and lusted for you. You then introduced yourself and they did the same. You then went inside the temple and the girls followed you. When you were all inside, you told the girls that you were searching for the Chaos Emeralds; seven gems of great power that could, in the wrong hands, destroy the planets. The girls gasped and said that they would help you. You accepted their help and you and the girls kept an eye out for the emeralds. But then Mina asked where you lived and you told her that you had no home. The girls gasped and asked how that was possible. You then told them that your brother Kyoji, who was now know as the Dark Gundam, destroyed your home and your parents. They all gasped even louder and then Mina told you that you could stay at her home. You accepted her offer and the two of you went to her home.
1551.title: The Temple

15511.content: When you arrived at Mina's home, you noticed a white cat with a moon on its head. "That's my cat Artemis." Mina said. She told Artemis that he could talk around you. He said that it as nice to meet you and you did the same. Mina then showed you to the guest room and you went inside. Mina really wanted to have you sleep with her though, but she didn't want to rush things. So she bid you good night and you told her the same.
15511.title: Mina's Home

155111.content: The next day, you woke up to the smell of pancakes. You got dressed and went downstairs to find Mina cooking brekfast. She told you good morning and you did the same. You then asked Mina "What's all this for?" She smiled at you and told you she just wanted to be nice, but you knew she had some other reason.
